Latin Name - 拉丁名: atractylodes lancea Thunb., ( 蒼朮 , 古蒼, 南蒼朮，茅蒼朮 ) Atractylodes chinensis (DC.) Koidz. (北蒼朮) Atractylodes japonica Koidz. Kitam（東蒼朮又名：關蒼朮. ）
Other Name - 別名: {'chi zhu': '赤朮', 'qiang tou cai': '槍頭菜', 'ma ji': '馬薊', 'qing shu': '青術', 'xian shu': '仙術', 'shan jing': '山精', 'shan cang zhu': '山 蒼朮', 'shan ci cai': '山刺菜'}
Common Name - 英文名: Sword like Atractylodes, Rhizome Chinese Atractylodes
Distribution - 分佈: atractylodes lancea Thunb.: mainly produced in Jiangsu, Hubei, Henan, Anhui provinces of China. Atractylodes chinensis (DC.) Koidz. : mainly produced in Inner Mongoliak Hebei, Shanxi, Liangning, Jilin, and Heilongjiang provinces of China. 南蒼 朮：為 植物南蒼朮的干燥根莖。 主產 於江蘇﹐湖北﹐河南﹐安徽。 北蒼朮：又名山蒼朮, 華蒼朮，為植物北蒼朮(槍頭菜, 山刺菜)的干燥根莖。主產於內蒙古, 河北, 山西, 遼寧, 吉林, 黑龍江等地。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: acrid, bitter, warm, aromatic 辛﹐ 苦﹐溫 ﹐芬芳。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: spleen, stomach, liver 脾﹐ 胃﹐肝 。
Actions & Indications - 主治: for treatment of yeast infection and dampness and flatulence; strengthens the digestion; expels wind-dampness; for diarrhea with vomiting; edema with fullness of the abdomen; induces sweating in patients unable to sweat; headaches, body aches, solar plexus pain, and pain in extremities due to wind-cold-dampness, and edema in lower limbs; headache of women due to deficiency, night blindness, improves night vision and diminishing vision. Simmering cang zhu in water to release fragrance can help in getting rid of fungi and bacteria. 主治﹕消 化不良，食 慾不振，胃脘滿悶，風濕﹐ 嘔吐泄瀉，浮腫腹脹，用于發汗﹔風寒濕痺，精神不振，肢體無力，水腫脹滿，濕痰留飲，婦人虛冷頭痛﹐夜 盲, 增進視力。 蒼朮加水。慢火煮沸使,释放出芳香味可殺菌消毒。
Medical Function - 藥理: The diuretic effect is not obvious but it can increase the secretion ions of sodium, potassium and chlorine in the urine. Effect on blood sugar: alcohol extract of cang zhu can maintain the lowering of blood sugar of regular rabbits. Effect on the inhibiting of CNS: the mixture of the essential oils of β-eudesmol, and hinesol possesses the effect of sedative on laboratory mice and it can prolong the sleep using hexobarbital sodium and it can inhibit spasm caused by electric shock. It also can help the delivery of carbon dust in the small intestines. Anti-ulcer effect: the β-eudesmol of cang zhu can inhibit the secretion of stomach acid and can inhibit ulcer. atractylone has an inhibiting effect on HBV 一. 利尿作用：雖利尿作用, 但不明顯，但能增加小便中鈉, 鉀, 氯各離子 排 泄。 二. 對於血糖之影響：蒼朮之醇抽取物對於正常兔之血糖有持續性下降作用。 三. 中樞抑制作用：蒼朮之精油成分按葉醇(β-eudesmol)，茅朮醇(hinesol)之 混合抽取物，對於小白鼠有鎮靜作用，能延長己巴 比妥鈉(hexobarbital sodium)之睡眠時間及抑制電擊痙攣作用，並能促進小腸內炭 末輸送作用。 四. 抗潰瘍作用:蒼朮桉葉醇可抑制組織胺性胃酸分泌，抗潰瘍 作用。 五. 蒼朮酮對乙肝病毒有明顯的抑制作用。 六. 抗潰瘍作用：1. 抑制胃酸。2. 保護胃粘膜作用
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: atractylol 蒼朮醇, hinesol 茅朮醇, β-eudesmol β-按 葉醇。 β-selinene β-芹子烯, elemol 欖香醇, 3β-acetoxy-attractylol 乙醯氧基-蒼朮醇 。Vitamin A type of substance 维生素樣 物质, Vitamin B 维生素 已, inulin 菊糖。 From another study: Atractylodes lancea Thunb contains 5~9% of essential oil. The main ingredients of the oil consist of atractylo, hinesol), β-eudesmol etc. Atractylodes chinensis (DC.) Koidz. contains 1.5% of essential oil. The main ingredients of the oil consist of atractylol, atractylone, hinesol, β-eudesmol etc. Atractylodes japonica Koidz. Kitam contains 1.5% of essential oil. The main ingredients of the oil consist of atractylol, atractylone, hinesol, β-eudesmol, atractylodin, atraetylin, atractylone etc. 據中藥網﹕ 南蒼朮 根莖含揮發油約5～9%。油的主要成分為蒼朮醇(atractylol), 茅朮 醇(hinesol), β-桉葉醇(β-eudesmol)等 。 北蒼朮根莖含揮發油1.5%，其主要成分為蒼朮醇 atractylol, 蒼朮酮(atractylone), 茅朮醇及桉葉醇等。 東蒼朮根莖含揮發油1.5%，其主要成分為蒼朮醇 茅朮醇(hinesol), β-桉葉醇, 蒼朮呋喃烴(atractylodin, atraetylin), 蒼朮酮 。
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 10 to 20 g. Concentrated extract 0.5 to 2 g. 10～20克 ﹔濃縮中藥：0.5～2 克
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: See yeast infection. See a report below.
Modern Application - 現代應用: lowering blood sugar, excretion of sodium. 降血 糖﹐排鈉。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Not to use in case of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat and/or sweaty with qixu (qi deficient). 陰虛有 熱氣虛多汗者忌服 。 氣虛內 熱，氣 虛多汗者忌服。 ①《本草經集注》：防風、地榆為之使。《藥性論》： 忌桃、李、雀肉、菘菜 Brassica chinensis、 青魚 (Mylopharyngodon piceu)③《醫學入門 》：血虛怯弱及七情氣悶者慎用。誤服耗氣血，燥津液，虛火動而痞悶愈甚。④《 本草經疏》：凡病屬陰虛血少、精不足 ，內熱骨蒸，口乾唇燥，咳 嗽吐痰、吐血，鼻衄，咽塞，便秘滯下者，法咸忌之。肝腎有動氣者勿服。 ⑤《本草正》：內熱陰虛，表疏汗出者忌服。
Name: cang zhu 蒼 朮
Body: cang zhu, Complementary and Alternative Healing Universitycang zhu蒼      朮(in English and Chinese 中英文)Translated by:Joe      Hing Kwok Chu朱興國      編譯To enlarge click          on the picture.[1]苍术酮的稳定性及其抗HBV体外实验研究, 王峰，蔡光明，郭慧玲, 1.中国人民解放军第302医院中医药研究所，北京100039；2.江西中医学院，江西南      昌330006A report from Shanghai      Donghua Hospital and others: Usingai yedisinfection incense, (made by Shanghai Everyday Chemical Products), which consists      of 30% of cang zhu powder and 20% ofai yepowder, smoking 4 hours, can kill offβ-Hemolytic streptococcus- A group﹐pneumonococcus﹐Hemophilus      Influenzae and Staphylococcus aureus etc. Smoking 8 hours can kill off Pseudomonas      aeruginosa)，and can inhibit the growth of Bacillus subtilis.上海華東醫院等單位報導，用含艾葉的消毒 香(上      海日用化學品試制，含蒼朮粉30％，艾葉粉20％) 烟熏4小時能 殺滅乙型溶血性鏈球菌A群 （β-Hemolytic streptococcus- A group）      ﹐ 肺炎球菌 (pneumonococcus)﹐ 流感桿菌 (Hemophilus influenzae)和金黄色葡萄球菌 （Staphylococcus      aureus）等 ，烟熏8小時能殺 滅綠膿桿菌 (Pseudomonas aeruginosa).， 并能抑制枯草桿菌 （Bacillus      subtilis）的生長。Sponsors' Ads by      Google 以下為谷歌所提供贊助者 之廣告A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading                   in progressClick here      for comment. Latin Name - 拉丁名: Tussilago farfara L.
Other Name - 別名: dong hua冬花，kuan dong 款冬 ，kuan hua 款花，ai dong hua 艾冬花，kan deng hua 看燈花，jiu jiu hua 九九花，tu xi hua 菟奚花，tu xi hua 兔溪花，ke dong hua 顆凍花，ke dong 顆冬，tuo wu hua 橐吾花，tuo shi hua 橐石花，hu xu hua 虎須花，kuan dong hua 款凍花，ku cui hua 苦萃花，shi dong hua 氏冬花，zuan dong hua 鑽凍花，ba jiao ji hua 八角烏花，xi dong hua 西冬花，zuan dong hua 鑽冬花。
Distribution - 分佈: Henan, Gansu, Shanxi, Shaanxi.河南，甘肅，山西，陝西。
Actions & Indications - 主治: cough due to coldness or heat in lungs.肺寒咳嗽,肺 熱咳嗽,肺虛勞嗽, 蜜炙款冬花,功偏潤肺止咳,尤宜於肺虛咳喘之證。
Medical Function - 藥理: cough arresting, phlegm expelling, asthma calming effectrespiration stimulating effecteffect on cardiovascular system鎮咳、祛痰和平喘作用。呼吸興奮作用。對心血管作用。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Flowers contain:': '花含:', 'faradiol': '款冬二醇', 'rutin': '芸香甙0.36%', 'arnidiol': '山金車二醇', 'farfaratine': '款冬花素', 'tussilagine': '款冬鹼', '14-acetoxy-7β-[3\x92-ethyl crotonoloxy]-notonipetranome': '款冬素', '14-acetoxy-7β-3\x92-ethylcrotomoyloxy]-1α-[2\x92-methylbutyryloxy]- notonipetranone': '甲基丁酰款冬素酯', '7β-[3\x92-ethyl-crotonoyloxy]-lα- [2\x92-methylbutyryloxy]-3,14-dehydro-Z-motomipetranone': '甲基丁酰3,14-Z-去氫款冬素酯', 'Hyperin': '金絲桃甙0.28%', 'triterpenoid saponin': '三萜皂甙', 'tannin': '鞣質', 'wax': '蠟', 'evaporating oil': '揮發油', 'taraxanthin': '蒲公英黃質', 'Leaves contain:': '葉含:', 'bitter glucoside red 2.63%': '苦味甙紅2.63％', 'gallic acid': '沒食子酸', 'springy rubber like substance': '彈性橡膠樣物質', 'dextrin': '糊精', 'mucilages': '粘液', 'inulin': '菊糖', 'phytosterol': '植物甾醇', 'stearic acid': '硬脂酸', 'palmitic acid': '棕櫚酸', 'glycerine ester': '甘油酯', 'tartaric acid': '酒石酸', 'malic acid': '蘋果酸', 'inverted sugar': '轉化糖', 'choline': '膽鹼', 'Carbon hydrogen compounds (C26H56， C28H58)': '碳氫化合物', 'saponin': '皂甙', 'betacarotine': '胡蘿卜素', 'vitamin C': '維生素C', 'polysaccharide': '多糖', 'ash contains zinc, up to 3.26% (computed withZnCO3)': '灰分中含鋅甚多，達3.26％(以 ZnCO3計)', 'Fresh roots and stems contain:': '鮮根莖含:', 'paraffin': '石蠟', 'Roots contain:': '根含', 'rubber 0.015%': '橡膠 0.015％', 'bauerenol': '降香醇(鮑爾烯醇)'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: taking orally, in decoction: 2 to 10 g; or in powder or pill form.external application: use appropriate amount, smash and apply. .口服煎湯:2~10克，或入丸散。外用適量；搗爛 ，敷患處。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: cough due to cold in lungs: kuan dong hua sancough due to weakness and consumption: bai hua gao肺寒咳嗽,肺熱咳嗽: 款冬花散For chronic coughing nonstop: zi wan 90 g, kuan dong hua 90 g. Make into coarse powder.Dosage: 9 g, add sheng jiang 3 g. Boil with about 350 c.c. of water. Simmer down to 60% of a cup. Strain and take it while warm. Take 3 to 4 times a day. [1]肺虛勞嗽: 百花膏紫菀散：治久嗽不止: 紫菀三兩，款冬花三兩。上藥粗搗羅為散，每服三錢，以水一中盞，入生薑半分，煎至六分，去滓溫服，日三、四服。（《聖惠方》紫菀散）[1]
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: use extreme care in cases of coughing out blood or pus. Not to use in case of chronic coughing with yinxu (yin deficient) condition.It is used with xing ren. Beneficial to use with zi wan. It is incompatible with zao jiao, xiao shi, xuan shen, bei mu, xin yi, ma huang, huang qin, huang lian, huang qi, qing xiang. 款冬花為 辛溫之品,易散氣助熱,對咳血或肺癰咳吐膿血者慎用.《本草經 集注》："杏仁為使 。得紫菀良 。惡皂夾，消 石，玄 參。畏貝 母，辛 荑，麻 黃，黃 芩，黃 蓮，黃 耆，青 葙 。"《本草崇 原》："肺火燔灼，肺氣焦滿者不可用。" 《 本經逢原》："陰 虛勞嗽禁用。"

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Salvia divinorum
Other Name - 別名: Ska Pastora; Shepherdess's Herb; ska Maria Pastora; yerba de Maria; Sally-D
Distribution - 分佈: native to certain areas in the Sierra Mazateca of Oaxaca, Mexico原產於墨西哥瓦哈卡的 Mazateca 高原地區。
Actions & Indications - 主治: In folk medicine at low dosage as a diuretic, and to treat ailments including diarrhea, anemia, headaches, rheumatism [2]Mazatec shamans use it for spiritual healing.
Medical Function - 藥理: Salvinorin A is capable of inhibiting excess intestinal motility, thus stopping diarrhea.
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: A diterpenoid known as Salvinorin A [1]雙萜類化合物 ：丹酚A [1]
Modern Application - 現代應用: Salvia divinorum and Mitragyna speciosa ("Kratom"), two unscheduled dietary supplements whose active agents are opioid receptor agonists, have discrete psychoactive effects that have contributed to their increasing popularity. Salvia divinorum contains the highly selective kappa- opioid receptor agonist salvinorin A; this compound produces visual hallucinations and synesthesia. Mitragynine, the major alkaloid identified from Kratom, has been reported as a partial opioid agonist producing similar effects to morphine. An interesting minor alkaloid of Kratom, 7-hydroxymitragynine, has been reported to be more potent than morphine. Both Kratom alkaloids are reported to activate supraspinal mu- and delta- opioid receptors, explaining their use by chronic narcotics users to ameliorate opioid withdrawal symptoms. Despite their widespread Internet availability, use of Salvia divinorum and Kratom represents an emerging trend that escapes traditional methods of toxicologic monitoring. The purpose of this article is to familiarize toxicologists and poison control specialists with these emerging psychoactive dietary supplements.Keywords Salvia divinorum-, Salvinorin A; Kratom; Mitragynine; Dietary supplements perildical . Written by： KAVITA M. BABU﹔CHRISTOPHER R. McCURDY﹔EDWARD W. BOYER Published by: Journal of Toxicology 2008, vol.46 (no.2 ) [1]
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: This herb is not legal in some parts of the world and also in some states in U.S.本品在世界有些地區和在美國有些州 是屬於違法物質。

Name: ge jie
Body: ge jie¡@ge jie (gecko)µðÓÈTranslated and editedby: Joe Hing Kwok Chu[1]http://www.yxlw.org/html/yao/fangji/20090906/23284.html[2] Nanning, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Cancer      Prevention Institute ", Guangxi Medical University Graduate School[2]«nÉr,广¦è壮±Ú¦Ûªv区肿½F¨¾ªv¬ã¨s©Ò",广¦è医¬ì¤j学¬ã¨s¥Í学°|Pharmacognostic Identification of Gecko (Gekko gecko ) andIts Counterfeits on Characteristics of CrudeDrug and Original Animal of 18 SamplesZhu HuaGuangxi College of TCM,Nanning 530001 ChinaRen RenanNanjing University of TCM, Nanjing 210029 ChinaAbstract¡@Objective: To identify medicinal material Gecko and its counterfeits. Methods: The commodity Gecko were investigated and 18 samples of different kinds commercial Gecko were collected from markets in China . Their characteristics of crude drug and original animal were measured and compared. Results: Of all the 18 samples, 2 were Gecko (Gekko gecko L.) and 16 were its counterfeits. Conclusion: There are many Gecko counterfeits in the markets of China. They can be identified by examining their appearance, characteristic of crude drug and original animal, according to the above results of studies.Key Words: Gecko; Gekko gecko; Identification; Counterfeit Material; Pharmacognosy; Gecko CharacteristicSearch this      siteProblems with website? Latin Name - 拉丁名: Pharbitis nil (L.) Choisy; Pharbitis purpurea (L.) Voigt (圓葉牽牛) Ipomoea nil (L.) Roth
Other Name - 別名: hei chou 黑 丑， bai chou 白丑，er chou 二丑，chou niu zi 丑牛子，hei qian niu zi 黑牽牛 子，bai qian niu zi 白牽牛子，la ba hua (trumptet flower) 喇叭花。
Distribution - 分佈: throughout China, especially Liaoning.全國均有。 主產於遼寧。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: bitter, cold, toxic. 苦, 寒。有毒。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: lung, kidney, large intestine. 入肺，腎 ，大腸經。
Actions & Indications - 主治: edema ascites constipation difficulty in urination berberi flatulence abundance of phlegm, cough, asthma abdomen pain with parasite 水腫 腹水， 二便不利， 腳氣, 腹脹, 痰壅氣滯，咳逆喘滿, 蟲積腹痛.
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Palmitic acid': '棕櫚酸', 'Gibberellin A3': '赤霉素甲3', 'Gibberellin A20, 26, 27': '赤霉素甲20 , 26, 27', 'glucoside': '配糖物', 'Pharbitic acid C, D': '牽牛 子酸丙， 丁', 'pharbitin': '牽牛子甙', 'tiglic acid': '順芷酸', 'nilic acid': '尼裏酸'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 4.5 to 9 g in decoction 0.3 ~1.5 g in powder form. 入煎劑﹕4.5 克 ~ 9 克。 入粉劑﹕0.3~1.5克 。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For edema of limbs and escites: Name of formula: qian niu san (pu ji fang) Composition: qian niu zi, mu tong, bai zhu, sang gen bai pi, mu xiang, rou gui, chen pi. For worm parasites: Name of formula: qian niu san (Sheng's zhun sheng) Composition: qian niu zi, da huan, bing nang, xiong huang. 牽牛散《普濟方》：牽牛子，木通，白朮，桑根白皮，木香，肉桂，陳皮。治水氣肢體浮腫，大小便澀， 上氣喘促。 牽牛散《沈氏尊生》：牽牛子，大黃，檳榔，雄黃。治蟲積。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: This is a strong herb. Using small amount can help bowel movements. Using large amount can cause heavy diarrhea. It can be used temporary for cough with abundance of phlegm and asthma but do not use for long time or in large amount. Do not use in cases pixu (spleen deficient), qixu (qi deficient) or during pregnancies.The raw seed is toxic and it smell is pungent and strong, and its laxative effect if drastic. After stir frying, it toxicity is less and the laxative effect is mild. After stir frying, the herb is loose and brittle and easier to smash and easier to decoct to extract the effective ingredients. 牽牛子為峻下的藥品，少用 則通大便，多用則瀉下如水。於用治痰壅氣滯，咳 逆喘滿，則只宜暫用，不可久服。孕婦及 脾虛 或 氣虛 者忌服。 生牽牛子有毒，氣味峻烈而瀉下力猛。炒牽牛子之毒性較小，瀉下作用較緩 和。且炒過後藥材質地變鬆脆，而易於粉碎和煎出有效成分

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Cyathula officinalis Kuan
Other Name - 別名: {'niu xi (in Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan)': '牛膝 (四川，貴州，雲南)', 'tian quan niu xi': '天全牛膝', 'du niu xi': '都牛膝', 'mi xin niu xi': '米心牛膝', 'jia niu xi': '家牛膝', 'ruo niu xi': '肉牛膝', 'da niu xi': '大牛膝', 'guai niu xi': '拐牛膝', 'tian niu xi': '甜牛膝', 'tian chuan niu xi': '甜川牛膝', 'long niu xi ( in Sichuan)': '龍牛 膝 (四川)'}
Distribution - 分佈: mainly being produced in Sichuan, Yunnan, and Guizhou. Recently also propagated in Shaanxi, Hubei, and Hunan. 主產於四川、雲南、貴州。近年來陝西、湖北、湖 南有栽培。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: sweet, slightly bitter, neutral. 甘，微苦，平。
Actions & Indications - 主治: rheumatism, hematuria, amenorrhea, abdominal mass （fibroids of the uterus, ovarian cysts, endometriosis, pelvic inflammation, blood retention due to gynatresia, extra-uterine pregnancy, bleeding in the uterus, and other pelvic masses) 濕腰膝疼痛，腳痿筋攣，血淋，尿血，婦女經閉，症瘕（子宮肌瘤，卵巢囊腫，子宮內膜異位症, 盆腔炎性包 塊, 陰道閉鎖的月經瀦留, 陳舊性宮外孕, 內生殖器的畸胎瘤, 或某些婦科癌變等所表現的盆腔腫塊, 脹痛, 或出血。 ）
Medical Function - 藥理: {'1.': '對子宮的作用：', '': '蛻皮甾酮對天芥菜鹼(heliotrine)所 致肝炎大鼠，有加速肝功能恢復正常的作用[9]。', '2.': '抗生育作用：', '3.': '對血液流變學的影響：', '4.': '對代謝的影響：', '5.': '利膽作用：', '6.': '降脂作用：', '7.': '對免疫功能的影響：', '8.': '其他作用：'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: for decoction: 6 to 10 g, or use in pills or in powder form. It can be used for soaking in alcohol for drinking. 煎湯: 6～10g；或入丸，散，亦可 泡酒飲。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: 1. Name of formula: xie qing tang with adjustment Application: hypertension with headache, constipation, stringy, stiff and large on the 3 positions of the pulse. Composition: fang feng, long dan cao, shan zhi zi, da huang, huang qin, chuan niu xi. 加減瀉青丸 (小兒藥證直訣) 主治：功能主治 高血壓頭痛，氣實便結，脈三部弦硬而大者。 處方 防風、龍膽草、山梔子、大黃 、黃芩、川牛膝。 用法用量 水煎服。 摘錄 《雜病証治新義》
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: not to use in case of pregnancy, excess bleeding during menstruation and spermatorrhea 懷孕，經期出血過多，遺精者忌用。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Citrus maxima (Burm.) Merr. cv. TomentosaCitrus grandis (L.) OsbeckCitrus grandis var. Tomentosa Hort.
Other Name - 別名: you pi ju hong 柚皮橘紅，Hua ju hong 化橘紅，Hua Zhou ju hong 化州橘紅，you zi pi 柚子皮。
Distribution - 分佈: The herb is produced in Hua Zhou, Mao Ming districts of Guangdong province and Bo Bai, Lu Chuan districts of Guangxi, Qian Yang district of Hunan or China.產廣東（化州，茂名），廣西（博白，陸川等），湖南（黔陽）。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Being used in wind cold type of cold and cough, itchy throat with abundance of phlegm, indigestion and over eating, over consumption of alcohol, chronic stomachache, flatulence, burping bad smell and tightness in stomach功能下氣消痰兼除寒發表。用於風寒咳嗽, 喉痒痰多, 食積傷酒, 哎惡痞悶，慢性氣管炎，哮喘，飲食積滯，食積傷酒，嘔惡痞悶， 長期胃痛，氣痛等。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: fruit contains naringin, naringenin. Peel contians citral, geraniol, linalool, anthranilic acid), methyl ester.果實含柚皮甙（naringin）、柚皮甙元（naringenin） ；果皮含枸櫞醛（citral）、香葉醇（geraniol）、芳樟醇（linalool）、磷氨基苯甲酸 (anthranilic acid),甲 酯 (methyl ester ）等
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: sheng tie luo yin 生鐵落飲,
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Do not use in cases hot phlegm with qixu (qi deficient) and/or yinxu (yin deficient) condition.氣虛及 陰虛有燥痰者不宜服。
Name: ju hong 橘紅
Body: ju hong,Complementary and Alternative Healing Universityju hong 橘紅by: Joe Hing Kwok ChuAccording to the official record of the district of Hua Zhou of Guangdong province. The herb ju hong produced there is especially effective because in the areathe soilcontains meng shi (Lapis Micae seu Chloriti) which possesses the effect of arresting cough. Ju hong that grows there absorbs the mineral thus is good for treating cough.據《化州縣志》載：化州鎮賴家園所產的橘紅，稱為正品化州橘紅，藥效特別好，主要原因是該地蘊藏著礞 石(礞石具有化痰止咳作用)，土層深厚，橘紅生長吸收了土壤裡礞石所致。ch this siteProblems with website? Latin Name - 拉丁名: Acalypha australis Linn.
Other Name - 別名: {'ren xian': '人莧', 'xue jian chou': '血見愁', 'hai pang han zhu': '海蚌含珠', 'cuo dou zhuang zhen zhu': '撮斗裝珍珠', 'ye li han zhu': '葉裡含珠', 'ye ma cai': '野麻草', 'deng zhan wo': '燈盞窩', '': ''}
Distribution - 分佈: Distributed in the south of the Yangtze River, middle and lower end of Yellow River, coastal and southwest and south China provinces other regions in China; additionally, in North Korea, Vietnam, Japan, the Philippines, New York state of the United States, .在中國分佈於長江以南，黃河中下游，沿海及西南、華南各省區；此外，朝鮮、越南、日本、菲律賓, 美國的紐約州也有。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: heart, lung, large intestine, small intestine.心，肺，大腸，小腸。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Detoxifies, improves nutrition, stops dysentery, arrests bleeding. For treatment of enteritis, dysentery, amoebic dysentery, malnutrition in children, hepatitis, malaria, vomiting blood, epistaxis, hematuria, blood in the stool, uterine bleeding; topical treatment of carbuncle sores, traumatic bleeding, eczema, dermatitis, snake bites.清熱解毒，消積，止痢，止血。用於腸炎，細菌性痢疾，阿米巴痢疾，小兒疳積，肝炎，瘧疾，吐血，衄血，尿血，便血，子宮出血；外用治癰癤瘡瘍，外傷出血，濕疹，皮炎，毒蛇咬傷。
Medical Function - 藥理: Medical function: In vitro tie xian cai decoction possesses antibiotic effect on several common Shigella antibacterial, especially on Shigella dysentery bacillus (2-fold dilution method in vitro). The dilution of 1:256, not only possesses bacteria inhibition effect also possesses bactericidal effect. Antibiotic effect on Shushi and Freund Shigella is less, and the antibiotic effect of Shigella sonnei bacilli is least. In vitro the tablets made ​​of tie xian cai also possesses anti Shigella effect. In vitro, 50% tie xian cai decoction possesses various degrees of inhibitory effect on Staphylococcus aureus, Vibrio cholerae, Bacillus anthracis, Shushi Shigella (using agar plate method). The antibacterial effect seems to be different on different parts of the roots, stems, and leaves, and on different bacteria. Tie xian cai alcohol extract also possesses antibacterial effect. 藥理﹕鐵莧水煎液在體外對幾種常見的痢疾杆菌都有抗菌作用，尤其對志賀氏痢疾杆菌效果好（試管內2倍稀釋法），在稀釋度為1:256時，不但有抑菌效力，且有殺菌作用。對舒氏和弗氏痢疾杆菌作用次之，對宋內氏痢疾杆菌效果最差。以鐵莧制成的片劑，在體外亦有同樣抗痢疾杆菌之效。50％鐵莧煎劑在體外對金黃色葡萄球菌、霍亂弧菌、炭疽杆菌、舒氏痢疾杆菌有不同程度抑菌作用（瓊脂平板法）；其根，莖、葉中皆含抗菌成分，但對不同細菌，用植物的不同部分其抗菌效力似有差異；鐵莧醇提物亦有同樣抗菌作用。
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 15 to 30 g.External use: appropriate amount. Use fresh herb. Smash and apply to affected area.0.5～1兩。外用適量，鮮品搗爛敷患處。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: Treatment of enteritis, diarrhea, vomiting blood, nose bleeding, blood in the stool, cough, asthma: dried tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Make into decoction and take orally. (Guangzhou armed forces "Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook")Treatment of dermatitis, eczema: wash the Jianshui outside oftie xian cai. (Guangzhou armed forces "Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook")Treatment of traumatic bleeding: fresh tie xian cai , appropriate amount, and a little sugar. Smash and apply topically.Treatment of snake bites: tie xian cai, ban bian lian, da qing ye, 30 g each. Make into decoction and take orally. (Jiangxi Herbs)Treating traumatic wounds: tie xian cai 18 to 30 g. Make into decoction and take orally. ("Shanghai Chinese Herbal Medicine)Treatment of Infantile Malnutrition: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Make soup with pig liver. Take orally. ("Zhejiang Folk Commonly Used Herbs")Treatment of Infantile bloating, testicular enlargement: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g products. Make into decoction. Take orally. ("Zhejiang Folk Commonly Used Herbs")Treatment of uterine bleeding: fresh tie xian cai 30 to 60 g. Smash and make juice or make into decoction. Take orally. (Northeast Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook)Treatment of Lack of mother's milk: fresh tie xian cai15 to 30 g. or use dried herb 6 g to 9 g. make into decoction with fish. Take orally. (Northeast Chinese Herbal Medicine Handbook)Treatment of scarlet fever, eczema: fresh tie xian cai, smash and make juice. Apply to affected area. ("Guizhou medicine")Treatment of asthma or coughing up blood: fresh tie xian cai 30 g. Make into decoction and take orally. ("Guizhou medicine")Treatment of necrosis fistula: dried tie xian cai dry 60 to 90 g, dried gou er cha (rhizome berchemia) 60 g. Simmer with wine and water. Take orally. (Fujian Chinese Herbal Medicine) 治腸炎，痢疾，吐血，衄血，便血，咳嗽氣喘：鐵莧乾品一至二兩。水煎服。（廣州部隊《常用中草藥手冊》） 治皮炎，濕疹：鐵莧煎水外洗。（廣州部隊《常用中草藥手冊》） 治外傷出血：鮮鐵莧菜適量，白糖少許。搗爛外敷。 治蛇咬傷：鐵莧菜、半邊蓮、大青葉各一兩。水煎服。《江西草藥》 治跌打創傷：血見愁(鐵莧菜) 六錢至-兩。水煎服。《上海常用中草藥》 治小兒疳積：鮮鐵莧菜一至二兩，和豬肝煎汁服。《浙江民間常用草藥》 治小兒腹脹，睪丸腫大：鐵莧菜鮮品一至二兩。水煎服。《浙江民間常用草藥》 治子宮出血：鐵莧菜鮮品一至二兩。搗汁服或水煎服。《東北常用中草藥手冊》 治乳汁不足：鐵莧菜鮮晶五錢至一兩，或乾品二至三錢。煎水，煮魚服。《東北常用中草藥手冊》 治丹疹，濕疹：燈盞窩(鐵莧菜)搗絨，取汁外擦。《貴州草藥》 治哮喘或咳血：燈盞窩(鐵莧菜)二兩。煎水服。《貴州草藥》 治附骨疽瘘管：鐵莧菜乾品二至三兩，勾兒茶乾根莖二兩。酒、水煎服。《福建中草藥》
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Do not use during pregnancy. Those who are old or weak with qi deficient should use less."孕婦忌用，老弱 氣虛者少用。" 《泉州本草》
Name: tie xian cai 鐵莧菜

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
Other Name - 別名: ji zhun pi, nei jin, jiu ji jin, hua shi dan, ji zhen pi, ji jin. 雞肫皮，內金 、炙雞金，化石膽，雞胗皮，雞筋。
Distribution - 分佈: throughout China 全國都有。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: spleen, stomach, small intestine, bladder. 脾﹐胃﹐小腸 ﹐膀胱。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Being used in weak digestion, vomiting, diarrhea, children worm parasites , bed wetting, spermatorrhea. amenorrhea. 用于食積不消 ，嘔吐瀉痢，小儿疳積，尿路結 石 ﹐肝胆結石﹐遺尿﹐遺精﹐閉經[1]。
Medical Function - 藥理: increases digestive juices thus shortens the emptying time of the bowels 增加消化液﹐ 縮短排便時間。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: ventriculin, keratin, bilatriene, vitamin B1, B2 胃激素, 角 蛋白, 膽汁三烯, 維生素B1﹐維生素B2。
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: For decoction: 3 to 10 g. In Powder Form: 1.5 to 3 g. The effect is deemed to be better than that of decoction. 煎劑﹕ 3－10 g。 研末服﹕每次1.5－3g，效果可能比入煎 劑 好。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: stones in the urinary tract:jin qian cao,, ji nei jin bed wetting of children and adult frequent urination : sang piao xiao, long gu, mo li 尿石﹕金 錢草﹐雞 內金 小兒尿失禁﹐ 成人尿頻﹕桑螵蛸﹐ 龍骨﹐牡 蠣 。
Name: ji nei jin 雞內金

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Allium tuberosum Rottler
Japanese Name - 日語: nira (kanji: 韮; hiragana: にら; katakana: ニラ)， kyushi (seed)
Other Name - 別名: jiu 韭，shan jiu 山韭，feng ben 豐本，bian cai 扁 菜，cao zhong ru 草鐘乳，qi yang cao 起陽草，chang sheng jiu 長生韭，lan ren cai 懶 人菜。
Common Name - 英文名: English: Chinese leeksTagalog, Cebuan: kutsayNepalese: dundoku sagIndonesian: bawang kucai
Distribution - 分佈: whole China.全中國。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: Seed: acrid, sweet, warm葉：甘 ，辛，鹹，溫。根：辛。韭子：辛，甘，溫。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: Seed: kidney, liver.Leaves: stomach, liver, kidney.Roots: liver.韭菜籽：腎，肝。葉：胃，肝，腎。根：肝。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Jiu cai is used as stimulating tonic. It possesses the effects of improving digestion, enhancing mental alertness, warming. Roots and leaves and be juiced and can be used for anti inflammation, arresting bleeding and pain. It is suitable for gan shen yin xu (liver-kidney yin deficient) with sweating during sleep, bed wetting, frequent urination, impotence, priapism, spermatorrhea, esophagus cancer, nausea, dysentery, abdomen pain, menses sickness, pain during menses, bleeding not during menses, vagina discharge, injuries from impact, vomiting blood, nose bleeding. Being use inyinxu (yin deficient), immature ejaculation and spermtorrhea.為振奮性強壯藥，有健胃，提神，溫暖作用。根，葉搗汁有消炎止血，止痛之功。適用於肝腎陰虚盜汗，遺尿，尿頻，陽痿，陽強不倒，遺精，夢遺，噎隔 (食管癌)，反胃，下痢，腹痛，婦女月經病，痛經，經漏，帶 下以及跌打損傷，吐血，鼻衄等症，用於補陰 虛，精關不固等。
Medical Function - 藥理: The sulfur compound in jiu cai can help absorb vitamin A and B1.Effect on cardiovascular system: its sulfur containing substance and ascorbic acid can improve the activities of endotthelial nitric oxide synthase (eNOs) thus promoting vasodilation and lowering blood pressure, improving capillary circulation, and anti arterio-sclerosis.[7]May inhibit stomach and asophagus cancer. [4] jiu cai extract inhibited cancer cell growth and induced apoptosis in vitro. Oral administration of jiu cai extract significantly reduced lung metastases [5]韭菜中的硫化物能幫助人體吸收維 生素B1及維生素A有抗胃癌，食道癌之作用。[4] 韭菜提取物抑制腫瘤細胞的生長和誘導的凋亡。中國韭菜提取物口服顯著降低肺癌的轉移[5]。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: Four new steroidal saponins have been isolated from the seeds of Allium tuberosum: 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20R)-20-O-methyl-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (1); 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20R)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l- rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (2); 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20S)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-2α,3β,20,26-tetraol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l- rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (3); and 26-O-β-d-glucopyranosyl-(25S,20S)-5α-furost-22(23)-en-3β,20,26-triol 3-O-α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→2)-[α-l-rhamnopyranosyl-(1→4)]-β-d-glucopyranoside (4).【1】The plant contains: vitamin C, B1, B2, niacin, carotene, carbohydrates, and mineral. It also contain high level of fiber.韭菜籽：四種新的甾體皂甙曾於韭菜籽分離出來。請看以上英文部分。韭菜含 ：維生素C，維生素B1，維生素B2，尼克酸，胡蘿卜素，碳水化合物及礦物質。韭菜還含有豐富的纖維素。
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 100 g to 200 g per meal.Seed used in decoction: 6~12 g; or make into powder or pills.每餐100克至200克。韭子用量：6～12克，煎湯；或入丸散。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: jiu zi wan 韭子丸《聖濟總錄》
Modern Application - 現代應用: Study on Cell Agglutination and Sugar-inhibiting Action of the Lectin from jiu cai
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: It is not suitable for those who are yinxu (yin deficient). Because of its abundance of coarse fiber, it is not easy to be digested. Easting too much can irritate the the wall of the intestines and cause diarrhea.According to Ben Cao Gang Mu eating too much jiu cai can lead to blurry eyesight and confusion or even coma 【2】. It should be avoided especially after drinking alcohol.陰虛及 熱性病症的人不宜食用。韭菜的粗纖維多，不易消化吸收，，否則大量粗纖維可刺激腸壁而引起腹瀉。《本 草綱目》 ：韭菜多食則神昏【3】目暗，酒後尤 忌。
Name: jiu cai 韭菜
Body: jiu cai, Complementary and Alternative Healing Universityjiu cai 韭菜，jiu bai 韭白， xie bai 薤白by: Joe Hing kwok Chu凝集素 （lectins)【1】【1】http://pubs.acs.org/doi/abs/10.1021/jf001062b【2】Jiu cai (Chinese leek) is high in oxalic acid. People with metabolism problems such as diabetes may be prone to developing kidney stones of calcium oxalate. Calcium oxalate can damage the kidneys and cause coma.【3】神昏指昏迷，譫妄，昏蒙等神志異常的表現，是溫病常見的急危重證之一。本條是指腎臟機能衰竭而 致昏迷。韭菜含草酸很高。多吃（尤其有糖尿病者）能致草酸鈣之形成。草酸鈣的腎結石鋒利能損傷腎臟而致昏迷。[4]http://cat.inist.fr/?aModele=afficheN&cpsidt=1882005[5]J Altern Complement Med.2001 Oct;7(5):517-22.Search this      siteProblems with website? Latin Name - 拉丁名: Solidago decurrens Lour.
Distribution - 分佈: produced in eastern, middle eastern and south western part of China.華東，中南，西南。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: acrid, bitter, neutral, slightly toxic.辛，苦，平，有小毒。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Arresting pain and swelling. For upper respiratory tract infections, tonsillitis, sore throat, bronchitis, pneumonia, tuberculosis, acute and chronic nephritis, diphtheria, infantile malnutrition, tetanus of new born babies, oral erosion.疏風清熱，解毒消腫。用於上呼吸道感染、扁桃腺炎、咽喉腫痛、支氣管炎、肺炎、肺結核、急性和慢性腎炎、白喉、小兒疳積、初生小兒破傷風、口腔糜爛等。
Medical Function - 藥理: Antibacterial effect using decoction (species not identified) of yi zhi huang hua in vitro against Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus pneumoniae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Shu's, Shigella sonnei bacilli showed varying degrees of inhibition. Decoction taken orally: Rabbits tracheitis (inhalation of ammonia vapor formation) role, showed a therapeutic effect, wheezing status lifted, wheezing disappeared relieve dry rales. Containing saponins, yet some expectorant effect. Diuretic effect extracts of mice were injected subcutaneously with a diuretic effect, but the dose is too large anti enables decreased urine output. Oral equally effective. People also. Prolonged storage of the herb can render it ineffective. Other role hemostatic effect of acute (hemorrhagic) nephritis may be related to the flavonoids, chlorogenic acid, or caffeic acid contained in the herb.The topical application can help treatment of trauma. It can be related to volatile oil or the tannins of the herb.1.抗菌作用 煎劑（品種未鑒定）在試管內對金黃色葡萄球菌、肺炎球菌、綠膿杆菌及舒氏、宋內氏痢疾杆菌有不同程度的抑菌作用。 2.對家兔實驗性氣管炎（吸入氨水蒸氣形成）的作用 煎劑內服，有治療作用，喘息狀態解除，哮鳴音消失，干性羅音減輕。因含皂甙，尚有些祛痰作用。 3. 利尿作用 提取物對小鼠皮下注射有利尿作用，但劑量太大反可使尿量減少。口服同樣有效。對人亦有此作用。久貯失效。 4.其他作用 對急性（出血性）腎炎有止血作用，可能與其所含之黃酮類或綠原酸、咖啡酸有關。外用可治創傷，可能與其含揮發油或鞣質有關。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'rutin': '芸香甙', 'kaemferol-3-3rutinoside': '山柰酚-3-芸香糖甙', 'leiocarposide': '一枝黃花酚甙', 'benzyl-2,6-dimethoxybenzoate': '2，6-二甲氧基苯甲酸苄酯', '3，5-dimethoxy-4-acetoxycinnamyl angelate': '當歸酸-3，5-二甲氧基-4-乙酰氧基肉桂酯', 'matricaria ester': '2-順、8-順-母菊酯', 'caffeic acid': '咖啡酸', 'quinic acid': '奎尼酸', 'chlorogenic acid': '绿元酸', 'cyanin': '矢車菊雙甙'}
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: 1. Upper respiratory tract infection:Prescription: yi zhi huang hua 12 g, yu xin cao18 g, huang qi 10 g, jin yin hua 12 g, liang qiao 10 g, gan cao 6 gBoil with water and use as tea. 2. Acute upper respiratory tract infection:Prescription: yi zhi huang hua 12 g, she gan 15 g, jie geng 15 g, ma bo10 g, jin yin hua 12 g, lian qiao 12 g, gan cao 6 gBoil with water and use as tea.1. 上呼吸道感染：一枝黃花 12 g，魚腥草 18 g， 黃芩 10 g，金銀花 12 g，連翹 10 g，甘草 6 g。水煎服。2. 急性上呼吸道感染：一枝黃花 12 g，射 干 15 g，桔梗 15 g， 馬勃10 g，金銀花 12 g，連翹 12 g，甘草 6 g。水煎服。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Consuming by livestock can lead to paralysis and movement disorders and other symptoms of poisoning.家畜誤食可引致痲痺及運動障礙等中毒症狀。
Name: yi zhi huang hua 一枝黃花

Distribution - 分佈: Sulfatedfucan is extracted from a sea weed, Laminaria japonica.The main production areas are China and Japan.岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 提取于海帶科植物海帶（Laminaria japonica ）
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: light yellow powder; can be dissolved in water.微黄色粉末，能溶于水
Actions & Indications - 主治: Supplement to cancer therapy
Medical Function - 藥理: Medical Functions:anti-tumor: fucoidans inhibit the heparinase of cancer cells and inhibits secretion of growth factors of cancer cells. These growth factors are attached to the sulfated heparin. Fucoidans also have strong attraction to some of those growth factors and prevent them to return to the combining to the cancer cells. The cancer cells that have combined with fucoidans become mal-nourished and the reproduction function of the cancer cells will become weakened and exhausted.anti-virus.antibioticanti platelet coagulation: anti blood clotlower blood lipidssuppresses overly active auto immune system [1]藥理﹕抗凝作用，促進腎臟損傷的修復作用，抗氧化、抗血脂、抗凝血、岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 的抗癌作用： 抑制癌细胞所分泌的肝素酶，使得附着硫酸類肝素的癌细胞增殖因子难以游离出来；另外，岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 對一部分的增殖因子有很强的吸附作用，所以可將從硫酸類肝素上游離出 來的增殖因子吸附，避免其回復結合到癌细胞。和岩藻聚糖硫酸酯 結合後的癌细胞由於無法獲取增殖因子，漸漸發生 營養不足、增殖能力减弱、逐漸趋向衰竭，其結果使得癌细胞向周围組織的浸潤受到抑制而 抗 腫瘤、抑制免疫作用
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: Sulfated fucan岩藻多糖硫酸酯
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: It should not contain excessive amount of arsenic, cadmium and mercury.
Name: fucoidan 岩藻聚糖硫酸酯
Body: fucoidans, Complementary and Alternative Healing UniversityComplementary and Alternative Healing UniversityHome現代 中藥辭典fucoidan岩藻聚糖硫酸酯Compiled and Translatedby: Joe Hing kwok ChuFucoidans are a family of high molecular weight sulfated polysaccharides. Latin Name - 拉丁名: Viola yedoensis MakViola chinensis G. Don.
Other Name - 別名: {'Other Name - 別名': '別名：', 'jian tou cao': '箭頭草', 'du xing hu': '獨行虎', 'yang jiao zi': '羊角子', 'mi bu dai': '米布袋', 'jin jin cai': '堇堇菜', 'di ding cao': '地丁草', 'jiao zi': '角子', 'bao jian cao': '寶劍草', 'li tou cao': '犁頭草', 'zi di ding': '紫地丁', 'tu er cao': '免耳草', 'xiao jiao zi hua': '小角子花', 'jin jian dao': '金剪刀'}
Distribution - 分佈: Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Anhui, and all northeastern China.江 蘇 ﹐ 浙 江 ﹐ 安 徽 ﹐ 東 北 各 地 。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: acrid, bitter, cold.辛 ﹐ 苦 ﹐ 寒 。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Snake bite: use fresh zi hua di ding to make juice and take internally. Also combine a small amount of xiong huang,. smash and apply externally.Red eyes： boils with liver yang ascending : combine this herb with ju hua, chan tui and make into decoction and use as tea.治毒 蛇咬傷 ﹕ 用鮮品搗汁内服，亦可配雄 黃少許， 搗爛外敷。肝陽上亢， 目赤腫瘤 ﹕本品 配菊花，蟬 蛻等
Medical Function - 藥理: To certain degree, inhibits Saphylococcus aureus, Pneumonococcus, Streptococcus A, Streptococcus B, Escherichia coli, Hemophilus Influenzae, Corynebacterium diphtheriae, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Staphylococcus albus, Candida albicans. [2]The extract of zi hua di ding, within non-toxic concentration, can totally inhibit the growth of HIV. The extract of dimethylsulfoxide of zi hua di ding possesses a very strong inhibitive effect on in-vitro HIV activities.[1]對金黃色葡萄球菌﹐ 肺炎球菌﹐ 甲型鏈球菌﹐ 乙型 鏈珠菌﹐ 大腸桿菌﹐ 流感桿菌﹐ 白喉桿菌﹐ 綠膿桿菌﹐ 白色葡萄球菌﹐ 白色念球菌有不同程度的抑制作用。紫花地丁提取物在低於毒性劑量的 濃度下，可完全抑制艾滋病毒（HIV）的生長，紫花地丁的二甲亞砜提 取物具有很強的體外抑制HIV活性[1]
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: palmitic acid, p-hydroxybenzoic acid, trans-p-hydroxycinnamic acid, butane-dioic acid, tetracosanoyl-p-hydroxy phenethylamine, kaempferol-3-Omega-rhamnopyranoside.
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 9 ～ 15 g. Large dosage can be up to 30 g.9 ～5 克。大剤量可用到30克。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: Name of Formula: zi hua di ding san (Zheng Zhi Zhun Sheng) Applications: for various kinds of boilsComposition: zi hua di ding, dang gui﹐ da huang ﹐ chi shao yao﹐ jin yin hua﹐ huang qi﹐ gan caoBoil with water and use as tea. 藥方名：紫花地丁散(證 治準繩 》主治：諸瘡腫痛組成：紫花地丁﹐當歸﹐大黃 ﹐赤芍﹐金銀花﹐黃耆﹐ 甘草。水煎服。
Modern Application - 現代應用: anti HIV [1]
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) .脾虛者 禁忌 用 。

Pharmaceutical Name - 英文药名: chuan bei mu: Bulbus Fritillariae Cirrhosaezhe bei mu: Bulbus Fritillariae Thunbergii
Latin Name - 拉丁名: chuan bei mu: Fritillaria cirrhosa D. Don; F. unibracteata Hsiao et K. C. Hsiao, F. prezwalskii Maxim., F. delavayi Franch.zhe bei mu: Fritillaria thunbergii Miq., also as Fritillaria verticillata Willd. var. Fritillaria thunbergii Bak.
Cantonese - 粵語發音: cyun1 bui3 (chuan bei 川貝);zit3 bui3 (zhe bei 浙貝)
Other Name - 別名: chuan bei mu: chuan bei 川貝, jian bei mu 尖貝母zhe bei mu: zhe bei 浙貝, xiang bei 象貝, da bei mu 大貝母
Distribution - 分佈: chuan bei mu: Sichuan, Yunnan, Xizangzhe bei mu: Zhejiang, Jiangsu, Anhui, Hunan川貝母：四川，云南，西藏。浙貝母：浙江，江蘇，安徽，湖南。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: chuan bei mu: mildly cold, sweet, bitterzhe bei mu: bitter cold川貝母: 性微寒，味甘苦 。浙貝母: 苦，寒。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Clears lung heat and rids of phlegm, hot cough due to yinxu with thick phlegm, breast scrofula, nodules, external application for boils.Chuan bei mu is mildly cold and good for moisturizing: chronic cough that injured yin ( into yinxu), dry cough without phlegm.zhe bei mu is colder than chuan bei mu: its purging is stronger than chuan bei mu. It is used for getting rid of stagnant phlegm, stopping cough, scrofula and boils. Suitable for cough with yellow phlegm.潤肺散結，止咳化痰。肺 熱 ，陰 虛 咳 嗽 痰 稠 ， 肺癰，乳 腺 炎 ， 肺 虛 ， 瘰 瘳 ， 久 咳 ， 外治惡瘡。川貝母苦甘微寒，以滋潤見長，用於肺燥咳嗽及久咳傷陰，乾 咳無痰的。 浙貝母苦寒，寒性大於川貝，開泄力大。適 用於外感風邪，用於清肺散結，化 痰止咳，瘰癧痰核，癰腫瘡毒之 證。有黃痰者適用。
Medical Function - 藥理: 1. Suppress cough and expels phlegm.2. Small amount of the saponin can raise blood pressure of dogs, cats, and rabbits while large amount can lower it.3. injection of 7.5 ml/kg peimine to rabbits, increased blood sugar and it was able to maintain it for more than 2 hours [3]4. antibiotic effect.祛痰止咳。小量的貝母之皂素能增高貓，狗，兔子的血壓。大量則能降低其血壓。給兔子注射7.5ml/kg 貝母甲素能增高其血糖并能维持多過2小時。有抗生素之作用。(more to be loaded)
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: Chemical Ingredients:1. Chuan bei mu (川 貝母): chinpeimine, sonpeimine, fritimine, sipemine.2. An zi bei mu (暗紫貝母): songbeisine, 26-Imino-17, 23beta-oxido-5alpha-jerv-12-en-11-oxo-3beta-ol[1].3. Gansu bei mu (甘肅貝母): minpeimine, minpeiminine.4. Suo sha bei mu (梭砂貝 母): Imperialine, Delavine, Delavinone[2], Chuanbeinone[3], Dalafrinone [(22S, 25S) -3beta, 16Beta-dihydroxy-5alpha-cevanin-6-one], Dalafrine[ (22S, 25S) -5alpha-cevanine-3beta, 6beta, 16beta-triol] (22R, 25S) - Solanid-5-enine-3beta, 5alpha, 6beta-triol[4], beilupeimine, fritiminine.5. Zhe bei mu (浙貝母): peimine, peiminine, propeimine, peimidine, peimiphine, peimisine, peimitidinek, isoverticine, peimisnoside.
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: For decoction: 3 to 10 g. As powder form (mixed in water): 1 to 2 g.煎服:3克 至10克。研 粉沖服或調服用1克至2克。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: dang gui bei mu ku shen wan, jie geng bai san, yang fei tang.當歸貝母苦參丸，桔梗白散，養肺湯。
Modern Application - 現代應用: to be loaded
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Not to use by those withpixu (spleen deficient) type of cold, with wet phlegm and cold cough. Also not to use she dan chuan bei mo, chen pi chuan bei mo, chuan bei mu, fu fang she dan chuan bei mo. Raw bei mu is toxic and not for internal use.脾虛及有濕痰寒咳者 忌用貝母。 包括：蛇膽川貝末 ，陳皮川貝末 ，川貝末 ，復方蛇膽川貝末。 生的貝母有毒， 不可內服。
Name: bei mu 川貝 母
Body: chuan bei, bei mu, zhe bei, Complementary and Alternative Healing UniversityComplementary and Alternative Healing UniversityHome現代 中藥辭典Chuan bei mu川貝 母(in English and Chinese 中英文)Zhe bei mu浙貝母by: Joe Hing Kwok ChuClickhere to see picture of herb. 按此看圖。Sponsors' Ads by Google 以 下為谷歌所提供之廣告A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading                  in progressClick here for inquiryCopyright Notice按此看關於版權問題Last update: April 25, 2012;  11:48 a.m. LAHchuan_bei.htm  bei_mu.htm  zhe_bei_mu.htm
Note - 註: chuan bei, zhe bei, dong bei, da bei, yuan bao bei, zhu bei.川貝﹐浙貝﹐東貝﹐大貝﹐元 寶貝﹐珠貝。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Codonopsis pilosula (Franch.) Nannf.
Distribution - 分佈: Shanxi, Shaanxi, Gansu, Sichuan, and most of northeaster part of China、 陜 西，山西 ，甘肅，四川與東北各省。
Actions & Indications - 主治: tonifies middle jiao (improves digestive system by correct pixu conditions), corrects blood deficiency and enhances qi (lack of appetite, fatigue, thirst, diarrhea, vomiting, polapse of uterus, stomach, rectum due to pixu (spleen deficient) . 脾虛， 氣血兩虧，體倦無力，食少，口渴，胃下垂， 久瀉， 脫肛，子宮脫垂。
Medical Function - 藥理: Improves body function, anti fatigue Stimulates nervous system, improves immune system Increases red blood cells, white blood cells and heme Improves the function of macrophages Enhances blood coagulation Raises blood sugar (1) 強 壯機能 ， 抗 疲 勞 (2) 興 奮 神 經 系 統 ， 增 強 機 體 抵 抗 力 (3) 增 加 紅 細 胞 ﹐白細胞 ﹐血色素 (4) 促 進 血 凝 (5) 升 高 血 糖 (6) 增進巨細胞吞食能力
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 9~30 g per day in decoction 每 日量﹕水 煎 9 ~ 30 克
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: shi quan da bu tang, si jun zi tang, 十全大補湯﹐四君子湯
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Not to use in cases of infection of the digestive system. Incompatible with li lu (Veratrum nigrum L.) Side effects have been reported, like : dizziness, discomfort in the chest area, nervous and uneasy, dry mouth, etc. 如 消化道有感染（中 滿 邪實)忌用 。 反藜 蘆。 有 報導曾有 發生過副作用，如 ﹕ 暈眩、胸口不舒服、煩躁、口乾等。
Name: dang shen
Body: dang shen, Codonopsis pilosula, Complementary and Alternative Healing Universitydang shen 黨參(in English and Chinese 中英文)By:Joe Hing Kwok ChuSearch this siteProblems with website? Latin Name - 拉丁名: Sapindus mukorossi Gaertn.
Other Name - 別名: {'jin lou': '噤婁', 'fei zhu zi': '肥珠子', 'you zhu zi': '油珠子', 'gui jian chou': '鬼見愁', 'cuo mu zi': '搓目子', 'jia long yan': '假龍眼', 'mu huan zi': '木患子', 'mu wan zi': '木挽子', 'xi shou guo': '洗手果', 'you huan zi': '油患子', 'fei zao shu': '肥皂樹', 'fei zao guo': '肥皂果', 'huang mu shu': '黃目樹'}
Common Name - 英文名: English: soapnut, soap nut, soapberry, soap Berry, washnut, and wash nut.Hindi: Ritha, Reetha, Aritha, Dodan, Doadni, Doda, Kanma and Thali
Distribution - 分佈: Originally it was distributed in south of the Yangtze River of China as well as Indochina, India and Japan. Now also cultivated in Guangdong, Fujian, Guangxi, Jiangxi, Zhejiang provinces.原產中國長江流域以南各地以及中南半島各地，印度和日本。現在 ，廣東，福建，廣西 ，江西，浙江等地區有栽培。
Actions & Indications - 主治: For treatment of sore and swollen throat, cough, indigestion, vaginal discharge, malnutrition, sores, swollen boils,, diphtheria, seminal vesicle disease, cloudy discharge from urination, frequent urination, infection, phlegm, parasites..治喉痺腫痛，咳喘，食滯，白帶，疳積，瘡痺，腫毒。用於白喉症 ，精囊病，淋濁尿頻。清熱，祛痰，消積，殺蟲。
Medical Function - 藥理: spermicidal, contraceptive, hepatoprotective, emetic, anti-inflammatory and anti-protozoal. [1]殺精避孕，保肝，催吐，抗炎和抗原生動物。[1]
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: 看中文網站：http://proj3.sinica.edu.tw/~chem/servxx6/files/paper_10921_1237954434.pdf
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: For oral consumption: for decoction 3 - 6 g; or make into powder and take orally.External use: make into powder and blow into throat, or for brushing teeth, or make into decoction for washing the affected area, or simmer into extract of paste and apply to affected areas.內服：煎湯，3 ~6 g；研末或煨食。外用：研末吹喉，擦牙 ，或煎湯洗，熬膏塗。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For treatment of sore and swollen throat, one side or both side: wu huan zi 9 g, feng wei cao 9 g. Boil with water and take orally. [2]For treatment of sore and swollen throat: wu huan zi 6 g, yuan ming fen 4.5 g, bing pian 1.8 g. If sickness is serious add she xiang 0.3 g. [2]For treatment of asthma: wu huan zi burned into ash. Mix and drink with boiled water. For small children: 1.8 g. For adult, use 3 g. Take every day for a few days. [2]For parasites and malnutrition: wu huan zi 5-7 pieces. Boil with water or bake till cooked. Once a day. It can be taken continuously for a few day. [3]For Dermatophytes fungal infection (ring worm): use appropriate amount of wu huan zi and boil with vinegar. Wash and rub the affected areas with the liquid. [2]For treatment of toothache: wu huan zi 30 g, da huang 30 g, xiang fu 30 g, qing yan 15 g. Wrap the herbs with clay and bake. Grind into powder and use it for brushing teeth. [4] 治雙單 鵝喉(一邊或兩邊喉嚨腫痛）：無患子三錢，鳳尾草三錢，煎服。《嶺南草藥誌》 治 鵝喉：無患子二錢，元明粉一錢五分，梅片六 分，研極細末吹喉。嚴重者加麝 香一 分。《嶺南草藥誌》 治 哮喘：無患子煅灰，開水沖服，小兒每次六分，成人每次錢，每日一次， 連服數天。《嶺南草藥誌》 治 蟲積食滯：無患子五至七粒，煨熟吃，每日一次，可連服數日。《廣西民 間常用草藥》 治 厚皮癬：無患子酌量，用好醋煎沸，趁熱搽洗患處。《嶺南草藥誌》 治 牙齒腫痛：無患子，大 黃，香附子各一兩，青 鹽半兩，泥固煅研，日用擦牙。《普濟方》
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: no known side effect. Avoid direct contact with eyes.避免與眼睛接觸。目前還沒發現有文獻記載不良反應。

Actions & Indications - 主治: For treatment of rheumatoid arthritis, injury of the loin muscles, heat in lungs, cough due to lung deficient, tuberculosis, chronic asthma, chronic hepatitis, spermatorrhea, leukorrhea, weakness in the arms and legs, and injury from impact and sprain. 用於腰肌勞損，風濕性關節炎，治肺熱，肺虛咳嗽，肺結核，慢性支氣管炎，慢性肝炎，遺精，白帶，手脚無力，跌打損傷。
Medical Function - 藥理: strong lymphocyte proliferation inhibitory activity [2] 有強的抑制淋巴細胞增殖作用 [2]
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'flemiphilippinin C, D [1]': '蔓性千斤拔素C，D', '5,7,3\x92,4-tetrahydroxy-6,8-diprenylisoflavone': '5，7，3＇，4＇-四羥基-6，8-雙異戊烯基異黃酮', 'flemichin D': '千斤拔素 D', 'lupeol': '羽扇豆醇', 'β-sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇'}

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Cassia tora, L.; Cassia obtusifolia L
Other Name - 別名: cao jue ming 草决明，jue ming zi 決明子，ma ti jue ming 馬蹄決明，ma ti cao 馬蹄草，jia lu dou 假綠豆。
Distribution - 分佈: throughout China, especially in Anhui, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Guangdong, Guangxi, Sichuan.全國均産，尤其在安徽，江蘇，浙江，廣東，廣西，四川等省 。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: liver, kidney, large intestine.入肝，腎 ，大腸。
Actions & Indications - 主治: for treatment of amaurosis, cataract, conjunctivitis, red, swollen painful eyes, headache, chronic constipation, hypertension, liver diseases.用於肝膽郁熱所致的目赤腫痛，怕光流淚，頭痛。治青盲內障，結膜炎，目赤腫痛，多淚羞明，頭痛頭脹，慢性便秘，高血壓，肝臟疾患。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'The seed contains:': '決明種子含:', 'chrysophanol': '大黃酚', 'physcion': '大黃素甲醚，', 'obtusifolin': '美決明子素', 'chryso-obtusin': '黃決明素，', 'obtusin': '決明素', 'aurantio-obtusin': '橙黃決明素', 'gluco-obtusifolin': '葡萄糖基美決明子素', 'gluco-chryso-obtusin': '葡萄糖基黃決明素', 'gluco-aurantio-obtusin': '葡萄糖基橙黃決明素', 'rubrofusarin': '紅鐮玫素，', 'cassiaside': '決明子甙', 'torosachrysone': '決明蒽酮', 'isotoralactone': '異決明種內酯', 'cassialactone': '決明子內酯', '2，5-dimethoxyben-zoquinone': '2，5-二甲氧基苯醌', 'toralactone': '決明種內酯，', 'emodin': '大黃素', 'aloe-emodin': '蘆薈大黃素', 'chrysophanol-9-anthro-ne': '大黃酚-9-蒽酮', 'cassiaside B,C': '決明子甙 B,C', 'rubrofusarin-6-O-gentiobioside': '紅鐮玫素-6-O-龍膽二糖甙，', 'alaternin-1-O-β-D-glucopyranoside': '意大利鼠李蒽醌-1-O-葡萄糖甙', 'physcion-8-O-β-D-glucopyranoside': '大黃素甲醚-8-O-葡萄糖甙', '1-desmethylobtusin': '1-去甲基決明素', '1-desmethylaurantio-ob-tusin': '1-去甲基橙黃決明素', '1-desmethylchryso-obtusin': '1-去甲基黃決明素', 'chrysophanol-10，10ˊ-bianthrone': '大黃酚-10， 10ˊ-聯蒽酮', 'questin': '大黃素-8-甲醚', 'benzoic acid': '苯甲酸', 'Also contains oil 4.65％-5.79％': '另含油 4.65％-5.79％，其中主成分為:', 'palmitic acid': '棕櫚酸', 'stearic acid': '硬脂酸', 'oleic acid': '油酸', 'linoleic acid': '亞油酸', 'Also contains oil that can be evaporated by steam, among them': '又含能被蒸汽揮發的油0．014％，其中:', 'dihydroactinodiolide': '二氫獼猴桃內酯', 'm-cresol': '間-甲酚', '2-hydroxy-4-methoxy-ace-tophenone': '2-羥基-4-甲氧基苯乙酮', 'methyl palmitate': '棕櫚酸甲酯', 'methyloleate': '油酸甲酯', 'In non-saponin substance, contains': '在非皂化物質中，有:', 'C16-C31alkyl': 'C16-C31烷', 'cholesterol': '膽甾醇', 'stigmasterol': '豆甾醇', 'β-sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇', '1，3-dihydroxy-3-methylanthraquinone': '1，3-二羥基-3-甲基蒽醌', 'Seed of Cassia tora:': '小決明種子含:', 'hrysophanol': '大黃酚', 'rhein': '大黃酸', 'norrubrofusarin': '去甲基紅鐮玫素', 'cassiaside C': '決明子甙B', '6-［a-D-apiofuranosyl-O-β-D-glucopyranosyloxy］-rubrofusarin': '紅鐮玫素-6-O-芹糖葡萄糖甙', 'toralactone-9-β-gentiobiobioside': '決明種內酯-9-β-龍膽二糖甙 (即 是決明子甙C)', 'chrysophanol-1-O-［β-D-glucopyranosyl1→3）-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-1→6）-O-β-D-glucopyranoside］': '大黃酚-1-O-三葡萄糖甙，', 'chrysophanol-1-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-1→ 3）-O-β-D-glucopyanosyl-1→3）-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-1→ 6）-O-β-D-glu-copyranoside': '大黃酚-1-O-四葡萄糖甙，', 'obtusifolin-2-O-β-D-glucopyranoside': '美決明子素-2-O-葡萄糖甙', 'galactomannan': '半乳糖配甘露聚糖', 'glucose': '葡萄糖', 'galactose': '半乳糖', 'xylose': '木糖', 'raffinose': '棉子糖', 'cystine': '以及胱氨酸', 'aspartic acid': '天冬氨酸', 'γ-hydroxyarginine': 'γ-羥基精氨酸', 'Also, the oil of the seed contains small amount of:': '又種子油中含少量', 'malvalic acid': '錦葵酸', 'sterculic acid': '蘋婆酸', 'campesterol': '萊油甾醇'}
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: Acute conjunctivitis: cao jue ming, ju hua, huang qi. Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.Hypertension: cao jue ming, ju hua, xia ku cao. Add water and make into decoction and use as tea.急性結膜炎: 草决明，菊 花，黃 芩。水煎服 。高血壓：草决明，菊 花，夏枯 草。水煎服。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: not to use in case of diarrhea, cold or influenza.泄瀉者或風寒外感者忌用。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Piper kadsura (Choisy) Ohwi
Other Name - 別名: {'man keng xiang': '滿坑香', 'lao teng': '老藤', 'da feng teng': '大風藤', 'yan hu jiao': '岩胡椒', 'ba yan xiang': '巴岩香', 'feng teng': '風藤'}
Distribution - 分佈: It is distributed in Zhejiang, Fujian, Guangdong, Taiwan. Mainly produced in Fujian, Zhejiang, and Taiwan.分佈於浙江、福建、廣東、台灣等地。主產福建、浙江及台灣等地。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: acrid, bitter, slightly warm.辛，苦，微溫。
Actions & Indications - 主治: for getting rid of rheumatism, clearing meridians, correcting qi flow (li qi), arresting pain. Mainly used in wind cold type of arthritis, pain in joints, spastic muscles, cold and pain in abdomen, edema.祛風濕；通經絡；理氣；止痛。主風寒濕痺；肢節疼痛；筋脈拘攣；脘腹冷痛；水腫
Medical Function - 藥理: Effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis:Hai feng teng can increase myocardial nutritional blood flow of mice, and reduce myocardial ischemia collateral vascular resistance of dogs, and has a good effect on coronary heart disease and cerebral thrombosis.[1][2]Anti-inflammation effect:[2][3] Hai feng teng extract can antagonize the rat intravenous endotoxin-induced decline in arterial blood pressure, and reduce endotoxemia pulmonary edema caused by increased pulmonary vascular wall permeability. Such effects of hai feng teng may be related to its antagonistic effect on PAF (platelet activating factor) by its chemical ingredient of futoenone The traditional Chinese medicine, hai feng teng, is a worthy for trying to treat endotoxin shock. [1]. Denudatin-B showed potent PAF antagonistic activity in 3H-PAF receptor binding assay[3] 海風藤能增加小鼠心肌營養血流量，降低狗心肌缺血區側枝血管阻力，對冠心病和腦血栓有較好的療效。海風藤提取物可以拮抗大鼠靜脈注射內毒素引起的動脈血壓下降，並能減輕內毒素血症對肺血管壁通透性增高引起的肺水腫。海風藤的這種效應可能與其中風藤烯酮與PAF的拮抗作用有關。PAF（血小板激活因子）提示海風藤是一種值得嘗試的治療內毒素休克的中藥。【1】化驗結果玉蘭脂B表現出強有力的拮抗3H-PAF之受體而降低PAF（血小板激活因子）之 活性。[3]
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Stocks and leaves contain:': '莖、葉含:', 'Futoxide': '長穗巴豆素，', 'Futoenone': '細葉青蔞藤烯酮', 'Futoquinol': '細葉青蔞藤酮醇', 'Futoamide': '細葉青蔞藤酷胺(風藤酰胺)', 'β-Sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇', 'Stigmasterol': '豆甾醇', 'Evaporating oil:': '揮發油:', 'α-Pinene': 'Α-蒎烯', 'β-Pinene': 'β--蒎烯', 'Limonene': '檸檬烯', 'Sabinene': '香檜烯', 'Camphene': '莰烯', 'Isoasarone': '異細辛醚', 'futoenone': '風藤烯酮', 'kadsurenon': '海風藤酮', 'licarin': '里卡靈', 'Denudatin B': '玉蘭脂B', 'futoquinol': '風藤醌醇', 'α and β-pinene': 'α-及β-蒎烯', 'Cedrene': '香松烯', 'Also contains:': '尚含:', 'β-sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇', 'stigmasterol': '豆甾醇', 'Modern Application - 現代應用': '近年又分得4個大葉素型雙環[3,2,1]辛烷類新木脂素。'}
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For postpartum arthritis [2]Name of Formula: Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction)Application: Pain in the body, red, hot and swelling in jointsComposition: ren dong teng 30 g, wei ling xian 9 g, qing feng teng 15 g, hai feng teng 15 g, luo shi teng 15 g, fang ji 9 g, sang zhi 30 g, zhui di feng 9 g.Boil with water and use as tea. 方名: 清熱除痺湯 （劉奉伍婦科經驗）功效: 清熱散濕，疏風活血。 主治: 產後身疼，關節紅腫灼痛。組成: 忍冬藤1兩，威靈仙 3錢，青風藤 5錢，海風藤 5錢，絡石藤 5 錢，防己 3 錢，桑枝1兩，追地風 3 錢。 支氣管炎：海風藤、追地風各二兩。用白酒一斤，浸泡一周。日服二次，每次10毫升，早晚空腹服。服時不可加溫，否則失效。心臟病人及孕婦忌服，感冒及月經期暫停服。(《全展選編·內科》)
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Those with condition of yinxu with fire should use with care.陰虚火旺慎服。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Ziziphus jujuba var. Spinosa (Bunge) Hu ex H. F. Chow
Distribution - 分佈: Hebei, Shaanxi, Liaoning, Henan河北，陜西，遼寧，河南。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: sweet, sour, neutral , non toxic.味甘,酸，性平, 無 毒。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: gallbladder, heart, liver, spleen膽﹐心﹐肝﹐脾。
Actions & Indications - 主治: calming, tonic yin, prevent abnormal sweating, anxiety, insomnia, excessive dream, palpitation, weak memory, dizziness, night sweating, instant sweating.有養心安神，益陰斂汗的功能。用於陰血不足，虛煩失眠，多夢， 心悸怔忡，頭暈，健忘，自汗盜汗等。
Medical Function - 藥理: calming,promote sleeprelieves pain,anti epilepsylowers blood pressureanti-arrhythmiaanti lack of oxygen in heart musclelowering lipidsprevent atherosclerosis 鎮靜催眠鎮痛抗驚厥降血壓抗心律不整降血脂防治動脉粥樣硬化
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Alkaloids:sanjoinine A (frangufoline)，B，D，E (nuciferine)，F，G1，G2，Ia (nornuciferine)，Ib (norisocorydine），K （coclaurine） （N-methylasimilobine）（zizyphusine）（caaver-ine，5- hydroxy-6-methoxynoraporphine） （amphibine D）': '生物鹼：酸棗仁鹼 A (歐鼠李葉鹼)，B，D，E (荷葉鹼)，F，G1，G2，Ia (原荷葉鹼)，Ib (去甲異紫堇定)，K （右旋的衡州烏藥鹼），N-甲基巴婆鹼，酸李鹼，5-羥基-6-甲氧基去甲阿朴啡，安木非賓鹼D', 'sanjoinenine': '酸棗仁環肽', 'Triterpenoids:': '三萜類：', 'betulinic acid': '白樺脂酸', 'betulin': '白樺脂醇', 'ceanothic acid': '美洲茶酸', 'alphitolic acid': '麥珠子酸', 'jujuboside A,B': '酸棗皂甙A，B', 'daucosterol': '胡蘿卜甙', 'Flavonoids:': '黃酮類：', 'spinosin （2\x94-O-β-D-glucopyrano- sylswertisin': '斯皮諾素，(2\x94- O-β-D-吡喃葡萄糖基當藥素)', 'zivulgarin': '酸棗黃素', '6"-p-coumaroylspinosin': '6"-對香豆酰斯皮諾素', 'swertisin': '當藥素', 'vicenin': '6，8-二-C-葡萄糖基芹菜素', '[apigenin-6-C-[（6-O-p- hydroxybenzoyl）-β-D-glucopyranosyl（1→2）]-β-D-glucopyranoside]': '6，8-二-C-葡萄糖基芹菜素（vicenin Ⅱ），芹菜素-6-C- [（6-O-對羥基苯甲酰）-β-D-吡喃葡萄糖基（1→2）]-β-D-吡喃葡萄糖甙', 'Other Name - 別名': '其他：', 'threonine': '蘇氨酸', 'valine': '纈氨酸', 'methionine': '蛋氨酸', 'leucine': '亮氨酸', 'isoleucine': '異亮氨酸', 'lysine': '賴氨酸', 'phenylalanine': '苯丙氨酸', 'K, Na, Ca, Zn, Fe, Cu, Mn': '鉀，鈉，鈣，鋅，鐵，銅，錳等', 'cGMP': '環鳥苷單磷酸', 'cAMP': '環腺苷單磷酸', 'ferulic acid': '阿魏酸', 'phytosterol': '植物甾醇', 'vitamin C': '維生素C'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 10～20g。Concentrated extract: 0.5 ~2 g10～20公克。濃縮中藥：0.5～2 公克。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: suan zao ren tang 酸棗仁湯
Modern Application - 現代應用: to be loaded
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: use with caution in case of chronic diarrhea, or in case of anxiety due to chronic bronchitis, yeast or bacterial infection.心悸,納少,多汗者,有實邪鬱火,如濕痰邪熱所致的心神不安者 忌用及滑泄症者慎服。
Name: suan zao ren 酸棗仁

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Millettia Dielsiana Harms (香花岩豆藤 (山雞血藤).)Millettia reticulata Benth , (昆明雞血藤)Spatholobus suberectus Dunn (密花豆屬密花豆)Kadsura interior A.c.Smith (内南五味子)Kadsura heteroclita (Roxb.) Craib．(異形南五味子)
Other Name - 別名: feng xue teng 風血藤, ma lu teng 馬鹿藤, zi geng teng 紫梗藤.
Distribution - 分佈: Guangdong, Guangxi, Yunnan provinces of China.分 佈 於 廣 東 ﹐ 廣 西﹐ 雲南 。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: bitter, slightly sweet, warm and nontoxic.味苦﹐微甘，性溫﹐無毒。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Actions & Indications: irregular menses, flow of menses not smooth, menostasis due to blood deficient , suitable for diseases due to blood deficient or blood stasis . low platelet count rheumatoid arthritis, especially with blood deficient and blood stasis. seguelae of strokes; combine other herbs with blood and qi tonic properties. blood deficient; combine other herbs with qi and blood tonic properties. 用於月經不調﹐經行不暢﹐血虛經閉等症。 治白血球細胞減少症。 雞血藤既能活血，又能補血，對 血瘀﹐血虛 之症均適用。 風濕性關節炎，尤其是慢性患者有血虛血瘀的更為適宜。用於風濕痺痛及手足麻木﹐肢體癱瘓﹐血虛萎黃等，配祛風濕藥同用。 治中風後肢體癱瘓，配益氣養血活血通絡藥同用。 用於血虛萎黃，則配補益氣血藥同用
Medical Function - 藥理: Medical functions:Decoction of Millettia Dielsiana Harms (山雞血藤) or Spatholobus suberectus Dunn (密花豆), showed that it could improve the anemia condition (created in laboratory) of rabbits and possessed anti-inflammatory effect.Small amount can enhance the rhythmic contraction of the uteri of rabbits, and in larger amount the effect is even stronger. Conceived uteri are sensitive.Decoction of Millettia Dielsiana (山雞血藤) can inhibit Staphylococcus aureusDecoction of Millettia Dielsiana (山雞血藤) enhance the function of macrophages and improve immune system.Inhibits platelet coagulation caused by adenosine diphosphate (in vitro), thus lower the vaso-resistance and improved the circulation of the coronary arteries and the circulation in the thigh.improved the low white cell count of lab mice caused by cyclophosphamide (環磷醯胺).lowered total cholesterol and increased the low density cholesterol of quails藥理﹕密花豆及山雞血藤煎劑對實驗性貧血的家兔均有補血作用，有抗炎作用。小劑量能增強子宮節律性收縮，較大劑量收縮更顯著，已孕子宮較未孕子宮敏感。山雞血藤煎劑體外試驗對金黃葡萄球菌有抑制作用。增強巨噬細胞功能。增強免功能。對環磷醯胺所致的小白鼠白血球細胞下降有顯著的治療作用。在體外能抑制二磷腺甘或膠原誘導的血小板聚集。降低血管阻力，如能增加離體免心冠脈血流量﹐股動脈的血流量等。降低鹌鹑的總胆固醇，提高高密度胆固醇：抑制心脏與降低血压作用
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'jixuetengsterol': '雞血藤醇', 'organic acid': '有機酸', 'tannin acid': '鞣質', 'friedelin': '無羈', 'friedelinsterol': '無羈醇', 'taraxerone': '蒲公英賽酮', 'β- Sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇', 'stigmasterol': '豆甾醇', 'campesterol': '菜油固醇', 'calcium oxalate': '草酸鈣'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: 10 to 20 g. Concentrate extract 0.5 ~ 2 g.10～20克；濃縮中藥：0.5～2 克。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For blood stasis: ji xue teng, hong hua, chuan xiong , xiang fuFor blood deficient: ji xue teng, shu di huang, dang gui.瘀滯者，配 紅花﹐川 芎﹐香附子﹐等以活血化瘀調經。血虛者，配 熟地黃﹐當 歸, 等以養血調經。
Modern Application - 現代應用: Spatholobus suberectus 密花豆See medical function on other items .其餘請看藥理條。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Use with care for those with yinxu with fire syndrome. 陰虚火旺者慎用。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Veratrum schindleri Loesi. f.﹐ (天目藜蘆)Veratrum grandiflorum Loes. f.﹐(毛葉藜蘆)Veratrum dahuricum (Turcz.) Loes. f. (興安藜蘆)Veratrum mauckii Regel. (毛穗藜蘆 )Veratrum patulum L. (光脈藜蘆)Hemerocallis thunbergii Baker [麝暑萱 (華東地區也曾用)]Hemerocallis citrina Baroni[金針菜 (華東地區也曾用)]
Other Name - 別名: cong ran 蔥苒﹐cong kui 蔥葵﹐shan cong 山蔥﹐wei lu 韋蘆﹐hui kui 蕙葵﹐gong ran 公苒﹐cong dan 蔥菼﹐li lu 梨盧﹐cong bai li lu 蔥白藜蘆﹐lu cong 鹿蔥﹐gan cong 憨蔥﹐cong lu蔥蘆﹐cong guan li lu 蔥管藜蘆﹐han cong 旱蔥﹐ren tou 人頭﹐du yao cao 毒藥草﹐qi li dan 七厘丹。
Distribution - 分佈: mainly produced in Shanxi, Hebei, Henan, Shandong, Liaoning provinces of China.主產於山西﹐河北﹐河南﹐山東﹐遼寧等省。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Toxic reactions include: the sensation of poking by needle in the throatand tongue, burning sensation in the upper abdomen and breast bone,drooping of saliva, nausea, vomiting, pain in abdomen, diarrhea, bloodin stool, numbness around the mouth area, blurry vision, hazy mind,arrhythmia. In serious cases the blood pressure drops, vertigo, headache,difficulty in breathing, whole body spasm and eventually function of theheart and breathing stop.一般中毒舌及咽喉有針刺樣感覺，上腹部及胸骨後有燒灼感，還有流涎﹐惡心﹐嘔吐﹐腹痛 腹瀉﹐血性大便﹐口周圍麻木﹐視覺模糊﹐神志不清﹐心律失常等。嚴重中毒可引起血壓下降﹐眩暈﹐頭痛﹐呼吸困難﹐全身痙攣，最後可至心跳或呼吸停 止。
Medical Function - 藥理: lowers blood pressure, lowers heart rate, lowers respiration rate.有降低血壓，減慢心率，減慢呼吸的作用。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Rhizoma of li lu contains:': '藜蘆 根茎含：', 'deace-tylprotoveratrine': '去乙酰基原藜蘆鹼', 'germerine A': '計默任鹼 A', 'protoveratrine A': '原藜蘆鹼 A', 'didesacetyl protoveratrine': '雙去乙酰基原藜蘆鹼', 'germidine': '計米定鹼', 'verazine': '藜蘆嗪', 'neogermbudine': '新計布定鹼', 'jervine': '芥芬胺', 'veratroylzygadenine': '藜蘆酰棋盤花鹼', 'rubijervine': '玉紅芥芬鹼', 'isorubijervine': '異玉紅芥芬胺', 'veramine': '藜蘆胺', 'veratrum-alkamine': '藜蘆鹼胺', 'veratramine': '藜蘆甾二烯胺', 'veramiline': '藜蘆米寧', '3，15-diangeloylgermine': '3，15-二當歸酰基計明胺', 'solamidine': '茄咪啶', 'daucosterol': '胡蘿卜苷', 'β-sitosterol': 'β-谷甾醇', 'β-sitosterylstearate': 'β-谷甾醇硬脂酸酯', 'cerotic acid': '蠟酸', 'stearic acid': '硬脂酸', 'Root and rhizoma of Veratrum grandiflorum Loes. f. contain:': '毛葉藜蘆根、根莖含：', 'zygacine': '棋盤花辛鹼', 'verzine': '藜蘆嗪', 'solanidine': '茄啶', 'hakurirodine': '毛葉藜蘆定鹼', 'Underground portion of Veratrum dahuricum (Turcz.) Loes. f. contains:': '興安藜蘆地下部分含：', 'pseudojervng': '偽芥芬胺', 'veratrosine': '藜蘆鹼甙', 'verdine': '藜蘆定', 'rubi jervine': '玉紅芥芬胺', 'veramarine': '藜蘆馬林鹼', 'veratroylzygademine': '藜蘆酰棋盤花胺', 'isorubi jervine': '異玉紅芥芬胺', 'Rhizoma of Veratrum mauckii Regel. contains:': '毛穗藜蘆根莖含:', 'angeloylaygadenine': '當歸酰棋盤花胺', 'maackinine': '毛穗藜蘆鹼', 'germanitrine': '計馬尼春鹼', 'zygadenine': '棋盤花鹼', 'verazinine': '藜蘆嗪寧', 'Roots and rhizomas of Veratrum schindleri Loesi. f. contain:': '天目藜蘆根及根莖含:', 'tiemulilumine': '天目藜蘆鹼', 'tiemuliluminine': '天目藜蘆寧鹼', 'Root of Veratrum patulum L. contains:': '光脈藜蘆根含：', '23-O-β-Dglucopyranosyl-20- isoveratramine (22S，23R，25S)': '23-O-β-D-吡喃葡萄糖基-20-異藜蘆甾二烯胺(22S，23R，25S)', '(22S，23R，25S)-23-O-β-D-glucopyranosyl-5，11，13-veratratrienine-3β，23- diol': '(22S，23R，25S)-23-O-β-D-吡 員葡萄糖基-5，11，13-藜蘆甾三烯胺-3β，23-二醇'}
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: In pill or powder form: 0.3 g to 0.9 g.External application: use appropriate amount. 0.3 克至0.9 克，宜作散劑。外 用適量。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: To promote vomiting: Use fang feng, gua di, li lu. Grind into finepowder.Take a small amount. Take with warm drinking water topromote vomiting.Note: li lu is very poisonous. The dosage is 0.3 to 0.9 gram.Vomit caused by taking this herb can be stopped by drinkingthe decoction of white portion of green onion.作催吐用。如欲湧吐痰涎，作為急救，可用防風，瓜蒂，藜蘆三味，研細末，取少量，溫水送服以催吐。本品有劇毒，用時宜慎。 用量為﹕0.3 克至0.9 克服本品後吐者服蔥湯即止。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Do not take li lu in cases of pregnancies or if the body is weak.The toxic reaction includes: lowering of blood pressure, lowering of heart rate and slowing of respiration rate. The main effect of the alkaloids of li lu is on the nerves of motor nerves, sensory nerves and vagus nerves. and also on the CNS andstriated muscles. It initially stimulates then paralyzes. Death can result due to the paralysis of the CNS of the respiratory system and heart. It antagonizes ren shen, dan shen, sha shen, xuan shen ku shen, xi xin, shao yao and not compatible with da huang and green onion. 身體虛弱及孕婦忌用。本品有劇毒，不宜久服，多服。藜蘆的毒性極大，含毒成分為藜蘆鹼﹐胚芽兒鹼﹐紅藜蘆鹼等。有降低血壓，減慢心率，減慢呼吸的作用。 藜蘆鹼主要作用於運動神經﹐感覺神經及迷走神經，並作用於中樞神經及橫紋肌，使之先興奮後麻痹，可因心臟﹐呼吸中樞麻痹而危及生命。反人參﹐丹參﹐沙參﹐玄參﹐苦參﹐細辛﹐芍藥。惡 大黃，畏蔥白。吐者服蔥湯即止。

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Laminaria japonica Arsch.
Other Name - 別名: qun dai cai 裙帶菜, jiang bai cai 江白菜. hai dai 海帶，kun bu 昆布。
Distribution - 分佈: Liaoning, Shandong, Fujian遼寧，山東，福建。
Actions & Indications - 主治: being used in tumor of the thyroids, tumor of the lymph glands, swollen testes, edema.用於癭瘤(甲狀腺腺瘤、結節性甲狀腺腫)，瘰疬 （淋巴結腫大），睪丸腫痛，痰飲水腫。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: 含藻膠素（algin），甘露醇（mannitol） ，半乳聚糖（galactan），海帶氨酸（laminine），海帶聚糖（laminarin），谷氨酸 （glutamic acid)，天 冬氨酸 (aspartic acid)，脯氨酸(proline)，維生素B1, C, P (viatimin B1, C, P) 硫磺 (sulphur)，鉀(potassium)等 etc.
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For treatment of tumor of thyroids: kun bu 10 g, hai zao, tu bei mu 10 g, tian kui zi 10 g, dang gui 6 g, chuan xiong 6 g, wu yao 6 g, ba ye za 9 g, xuan shen 12 g, hai fu shi 12 g. Boil with water. One package a day.治甲狀腺腺瘤，用昆布10克，海藻10克，土貝母10克，天葵子10克，全當歸 6克，川芎 6克 ，烏藥 6克，八月扎 9克，玄參12克，海浮石12克，用水煎服，每日一劑。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Use with care in cases of yangxu (yang deficient).陽虛者慎服。

S.H. Fu ( synonym : Rhodiola crenulata (Hook. f. & Thomson) H. Ohba ) （大葉 紅景天）Rhodiola yunnanensis [Franch] S. H. Hu (雲南紅景天）Rhodiola crenulata L. (大花紅景天）[23]Rhodiola dumulosa (Franch.) S. H. Common Name - 英文名: golden root, rose-root, roseroot, Aaron's rod, arctic root, king's crown, lignum rhodium, orpin rose
Distribution - 分佈: {'Varieties 種類': 'distribution 分佈', 'Rhodiola rosea L. （薔薇紅景天）': 'Xinjiang, Shanxi, Henan, Hebei. 新 疆，山西，河北', 'Rhodiola tibetica (Hook. f. et Thoms.) S. H. Produced in western part of Tibet, southern part of Qinghai., 分佈於阿富汗 ，印度及巴基斯坦。產地：西藏西部及青海南部', 'Rhodiola sachalinensis A.Bor.[Sedum sachalinensis（A.Bor.）Vorosh.] （庫頁紅景天）': 'Heilongjiang, Jilin. 黑龍江，吉林。', 'Rhodiola sacra（Prain ex Hamet）S.H.Fu [Sedum sacra Prain ex Hamet]. （聖地紅景天 ）': 'Nepal and provinces of China of Tibet, Yunnan. 尼泊爾，中國的西藏，雲南。', 'Rhodiola algida（Ledeb.）Fisch.et Mey.var.tangutica（Maxim.）S.H.Fu （唐古特紅景天）': 'Ningxia, Gansu, Qinghai, Sichuan.寧夏，甘肅，青海，四川。', 'Rhodiola megalophylla (Fröd.) Fu （小叢紅景天）': 'Jilin, Inner Mongolia, Hebei, Shanxi, Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Hubei, Sichuan.吉林， 內蒙古，河北，山西，陝西，甘肅，青海，湖北，四川', 'Rhodiola serrata H. Ohba 齒葉紅景天[24]': 'Tibet 西藏', 'Rhodiola fastigiata (Hk. f. et Thoms.) S.H.FU （長鞭紅景天）': 'Bhutan, Kashmier, Sikkim, Nepal and in mainland China provinces of Yunnan, Sichuan, Tibet etc.不丹、克什米爾地區、錫 金、尼泊爾以及中國大陸的雲南、四川、西藏等地', '': ''}
Meridians Entered - 歸經: spleen, stomach, lung, heart.脾，胃，肺，心。
Actions & Indications - 主治: Corrects qi deficient and tonifies the lungs; benefits the brain and mood; arrests bleeding; dissolves blood stasis and eliminates swellings.It addresses qi deficient with weak body, feeling cold after sickness, short of breath and weakness.Being used in coughing blood, cough in pneumonia, erectile dysfunction, leucorrhea in women.External use: impact injuries, scalding, high altitude sickness.功能：改善氣 虛而 清肺，益智養心，收澀止血，散淤消 腫。 主氣虛體弱，病後畏寒，氣短乏力，肺熱咳嗽。用於咳血 ，肺炎咳嗽，陽痿，婦女白帶，高原反應。。 外用治 跌打損傷， 燙火傷，
Medical Function - 藥理: Medical Functions:Anti-oxidant effect: it can protect the liver from damages caused by a lipid type of peroxide.anti aging [18]Lower blood sugar effect: it inhibits the increase of glycogen caused by glucose and epinephrine.Improves memory that has been damaged by drug or alcohol.Adjusts the blood flow of the CNS.Increases the flow volume of oxygen-carrying blood to the heart muscle; thus protects the muscle from damage caused by lack of oxygen.Anti-hypoxia: It may prevent hypoxia-induced biological changes by either increasing intracellular oxygen diffusion and efficiency of oxygen utilization or reducing hypoxia-induced oxidative damage with its anti-oxidative ability; thus prevents high altitude sickness.1Helps prevent strokes caused by hypertension.Improves exercise endurance3 It has been used to improve or maintain endurance performance of athletes during training or competition by increasing biological factors associated with oxygen uptake. In-vivo experiments have shown that oral treatment with R. rosea extracts in rats can significantly prolong the duration of long-distance swimming and activate the synthesis or re-synthesis of ATP in mitochondria, which acts as the main energy source for most cellular functions and is essential for locomotion and respiration.2Supplementation can reduce serum BUN, ALT and AST levels.[12]Anti-inflammatoryAnti-stress [6]Anti-depression [7]. Rhodiola rosea L. roots have potent anti-depressant activity by inhibiting MAO A and may also find application in the control of senile dementia by their inhibition of MAO B.[13]Alleviates anxiety [8]Catechol-O-methyl-transferase (COMT) inhibiting effect, potentially enhancing the activity of presynaptic released dopamine.[5]Prevents damaging effect of microwave radiation.Hepatoprotective effect [9]Decreased lipid peroxidation. Gui zhi and hong jing tian extracts may be effective for correcting hyperglycemia and preventing diabetic complications.[11]Suppresses the biological enzymes of HCV NS3, thereby preventing the replication of hepatitis C virus.Promotes the release of norepinephrine from rat penile corpus cavernosum smooth muscle cell and artery endothelium cell, which was correlated with its effect of resisting senility.[14]The adaptogenic, cardiopulmonary protective, and central nervous system activities of Rhodiola rosea have been attributed primarily to its ability to influence levels and activity of monoamines and opioid peptides such as beta-endorphins. [15]Prolongs the life span of fruit flies by about 24% - 25% that were fed with the extract of the herb.[17],[18], [19]beneficial anti-inflammation effects, lower COPD assessment test score and decreased high-sensitivity C-reactive protein, on COPD8.patients [20]effective in preventing the initiation of tumors and slowing down the tumor growth in mice bearing tumor grafts, thereby further demonstrating its possible potential for treatment of breast cancer progression and metastasis [21](See also a report that refutes this.)Cardiac stimulating effect. [25] 藥理﹕抗 氧化作用: 對脂質過氧化物肝損傷 有保護作用。抗衰老[18]降血糖作用: 抑制葡萄糖引起的肝糖 原增加及腎上腺素引起的肝糖原分解。對藥物與酒精引起記憶功能障礙有改善作用。改善對藥物或酒精損 傷之記憶力。調整腦中區的血流量 。對心腦血管方面有調整血液 流 動增加血液帶 氧 量對 心肌缺血， 缺氧的保護作用。預 防高原症。預防高血壓引起之腦 中風。抗缺氧作用它可能會阻止缺氧所 引起的生理的變化。通過增加細胞 內的氧氣擴散和氧的利用效率，減少缺氧 誘導的氧化損傷，其抗氧化能力，從而防止高原症。抗發炎抗壓力[6]抗憂鬱 [7]降憂慮 [8]紅景 天根通 過抑制 單胺氧化酶 A, 具有強大的抗抑憂鬱活性，也可以應用在控制老年痴呆症，抑制MAO B. [13]增強運動耐力。3 紅景天一直為體育專門用品，可提升或保持運動員於比賽或訓練期間的耐力。動物實驗證明，小鼠服食紅景天提取物後，能明顯延長長途游泳時 間，刺 激 細 胞內 線粒體中腺三磷(ATP)之合成或再合成。這種高能分子合成就是大多數 細胞功能的主要能量源，也是運動及呼吸不可缺的。2降低血清BUN，ALT 和 AST 水 平[12]。抑制兒茶酚 - O -甲基轉移轉移酶（COMT） 之作用，可能會增多巴胺。[5]抗微波輻射作用. 4 [25],保肝作用。[9]減少脂質過氧化。桂 枝和紅景天提取物可有效地糾正高血糖和預防糖尿病並 發症。[11]能抑制丙肝上的生物酵素NS3，從而防止丙肝病毒複製。紅景天促進釋放去甲腎上腺素與大鼠陰莖海綿體平滑肌細胞和血管內皮細胞的一氧 化氮，其抗衰老的效果有關。[14]能力影響單胺和阿片肽(例 如β-內啡肽)的 水平和活性。[15]餵食紅景天提取物溶液的果蠅能增加它們的壽命25%。[17],[18], [19]在慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）患者試驗中，紅景天有抗炎作用益處，能降低慢性 阻塞性肺病者的症狀，和降低高敏C反 應蛋白，[20]在小鼠瘤腫移植試驗中，紅景天能有效預防腫瘤的發生和減緩腫瘤生長，從而進一 步表明其可能潛在用於治療乳腺癌 進展和癌腫的轉移。[21]強心作用 [25]
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: {'Phenylpropanoids:': '苯丙酯類:', 'rosavin': '肉桂醇甙', 'rosin': '樹脂', 'rosarin (specific to R. rosea)': '酪 生 (只 在R. rosea中 存在)', 'Phenylethanol derivatives:': '苯基乙醇衍 生物：', 'tyrosol': '酪醇', 'salidroside (rhodioloside)': '毛柳甙（紅景天甙）', 'Flavanoids:': '黃酮類：', 'rhodiolin': '', 'rhodionin': '', 'rhodiosin': '', 'acetylrodalgin': '', 'tricin': '麥黃酮', 'Note - 註': '單萜類 ：', 'rosiridol': '', 'rosaridin': '', 'Triterpenes:': '三萜類 ：', 'daucosterol': '胡蘿蔔甾醇', '24 beta-sitostero': '24 beta-穀 甾醇', 'Phenolic acids': '酚酸類:', 'chlorogenic acid': '綠原酸', 'hydroxycinnamic acid': '羥基肉桂酸', 'gallic acids [1]': '沒食子酸 [1]', 'Other Name - 別名': '其它植物 成分:', 'tannic acid; 17 amino acids that are required by the human body; 21 kinds of trace minerals like iron, lead, zinc, cobalt, titanium, copper, and manganese; and also starch, fat, wax, protein, vitamins etc.': '鞣質，人體必需之17種氨基酸， 21種 微量元素(如 鐵，鋅, 鈷 ，鈦，銅，錳 等，另有澱粉，脂肪，蠟，蛋白質，維生素等', 'Rhodiola dumulosa (Franch.) S. H. Fu contains: [22]': '小叢紅景天含：[22]', 'kaempferol': '山奈酚,', 'kaempferol 7-O-a-L-rhamnopyranoside': '山奈酚7-O-α-L-鼠李糖苷,', 'crenuloside': '大花红景天苷,', "herbacetin 7-O-a-L-rhamnopyranoside, herbacetin 7-O-(3''-O-b-D-glucopyranosyl)-a-L-rhamnopyranoside": '草质素7-O-α-L-鼠李糖苷,', 'Latin Name - 拉丁名': '草质素7-O-(3"-O-β-D-葡萄糖基)-α-L-鼠李糖苷,', 'ellagic acid': '鞣花酸,', 'salidroside': '红景天苷', 'gallic acid': '没食子酸', 'ester': '乙酯.', '': ''}
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For chronic fatigue syndrome:hong jing tian 20g，huang qi 20g，dang gui15g，dang shen 30g，bai zhu 15g，suan zao ren 12g，shi chang pu 10g，sha yuan zi 12g，shan zhu yu 10g，fu ling 15g .One dosage per day. Boil with water and make into tea.慢性疲勞综合症：紅景天20g，黃 耆 20g，當 歸 15g，黨 參 30g，生白 朮 15g，酸 棗仁 12g，石 菖蒲 10g，沙 苑子 12g，山 茱萸 10g，茯 苓 15g 。每日一剤。(來源： 中國中醫藥報)
Modern Application - 現代應用: The extract of hong jian tian increased the lifespan of fruit fly populations, according to a University of California, Irvine study.[16]紅景天提取物餵 給果蠅，可以增加它們的壽命 [16]
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: It should be taken early in the day because it can interfere with sleep or cause vivid dreams during the first few weeks of use. [1]應在早上服用，因為最初幾周在晚上服用紅景天可能發生動的夢。[1]

Latin Name - 拉丁名: Trionyx sinensis Wiegmann
Other Name - 別名: tuan yu jia 團魚甲，shui yu jia 水魚甲，
Common Name - 英文名: hard shell of soft shell turtle
Distribution - 分佈: Mainly produced in Hubei, Anhui, Jiangsu, Henan, Hubei, Zhejiang, Jiangxi provinces of China.主 產 於 湖 北 ﹐ 安 徽 ﹐ 江 蘇 ﹐ 河 南 ﹐ 湖 北 ﹐ 浙 江 ﹐ 江 西 等 省 。
Properties / Characteristics - 性味: Those bie jia (soft turtle shells) sold, if they are clean and white in color, most of them have been extracted for bie jia jiao (gelatin). They are waste product and do have have medicinal value.市上賣的潔白， 看來很乾淨的鱉甲大多數經過熬煉鱉甲膠的廢物, 沒有藥用價值。沒經過熬煉的鱉甲應該還帶有一些皮肉的。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: liver, spleen, kidney.入 肝 , 脾 , 腎 經 。
Actions & Indications - 主治: For yinxu (yin deficient) with flashes: usually combine with qing hao, di gu pi For yinxu with heat and pain: usually combine with gui ban, mu li, bai shao, e jiao .For chronic malaria, pain in rib and chest, amenorrhea, cirrhosis hardening and swelling of liver and spleen: usually combine with san leng , e zhu, qing pi , xiang fu zi, hong hua ,tao ren.For enlargement of liver and spleen.For enlargement of thyroid glandsFor enlargement of lymphatic glandsBie jia should be cooked first (cook longer than other herbs) or roasted in sand.In promoting yin and and suppressing yang, bie jia should be use untreated. For treating breast tumors, it should be roasted in sand first.治陰 虛潮熱 ﹕ 常配青 蒿 , 地骨皮等同用 ；治陰虛陽亢動風 ﹕ 常與龜 板 , 牡蠣 , 白 芍 , 阿膠等同用 。治久瘧 , 瘧母 , 胸脅作痛及月經不通 ，癥瘕 積聚等症 ﹕ 可 與 三 棱 , 莪朮 , 青皮 , 香附子 , 紅花 , 桃仁等 配 伍應用 。 治肝脾腫大、甲狀線及淋巴 腺腫大。 治再 生障礙性貧血（即骨髓不造血）。 生 品先煎或砂炙。滋陰潛陽宜生用，軟堅散結宜砂炙用。
Medical Function - 藥理: Prevent cirrhosis of liver and spleenImproves immune system. Anti-tumor effect. Soft shell turtle shell powder, for oral of 280 mg / kg in mice with transplanted cancer MH134, inhibited tumors with reduced diameter, and significantly reduced tumor weight; but for ascites carcinoma there was no significant effect. On the nude mice with transplanted human colon cancer cells, given the daily dose of 800mg / kg of soft shell turtle shell powder, the result was that: treatment and control group, the inhibitory rate was 92.15%, and tumor necrosis area was 67%. Compare to using the drug 5-fluorouracil (5- Fu) group, the advantage was that it did not cause white blood cell count to decrease. This indicate that the turtle shell powder can inhibit colorectal cancer in human, and with only small side effect, bone marrow suppression effect is much less than that of 5-Fu. 《source: Zhong Hua Ben Cao 》藥理﹕防 止肝, 脾硬化 (組織壞死 )有 增強身體免疫機能作用 。抗腫瘤作用。鱉甲粉末口服280mg/kg對小鼠移植實質性癌MH134具有抑制作用，使腫瘤直徑減小，腫瘤重量顯著減輕。對腹水癌則沒有顯著作用。對接種人腸癌細胞的裸鼠每日按800mg/kg劑量口服鱉甲粉，治療35 天後與對照組比較，抑瘤率為92.15%，腫瘤壞死面積達67%，與5-氟尿嘧啶(5-Fu)組比較,其優點是不引起宿主白細胞數下降，表明鱉甲粉不僅對人腸癌有抑制作用，且副反應小，對骨髓的抑制遠比5-Fu輕。(資料來源: 《 中華本草 》
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: animal colloid, among them collagen is the main constituent, keratin, iodine, vitamin D, calcium phosphate, calcium carbonate.動物膠，其中骨膠原為主要成份，角蛋白，碘質，維生素D，磷酸鈣，碳酸鈣等。
Daily Dosage - 每日用量: For internal use: 10 to 24 g in decoctionFor external use: make into powder. Use appropriate amount and apply to affected area.內服 入煎劑 ，常用具10～24克。 外用：研末撒或調敷。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: For enlargement of liver and spleen: bie jia jian wan 鱉甲煎丸
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Not to use in cases of lack of appetite, loose stool due to pixu (spleen deficient)Use with care in cases of pregnancies脾虛, 食少便溏及 孕婦慎 服
Name: bie jia 鱉 甲
Body: bie jia, Complementary and Alternative Healing Universitybie jia鱉 甲Editedby: Joe Hing kwok Chusheng bie jia is raw shell, mainly used in nourishing yin (inyinxu (yin deficient)condition).zhi bie jia is baked shell, mainly used for swollen liver or spleen.生 鱉 甲 ，即  鱉 甲生 用 。 主 要 用 於 滋 陰 潛 陽 。炙 鱉 甲 ，即 砂 炙之  鱉 甲.主 要 用 於 軟 堅 散 結 。瘧母即慢性瘧疾或瘧疾反復發作所致的肝脾腫大。亦稱瘧痞。軟堅散結：乳癌腫瘤在中醫古典著作中稱為「積聚」, 「結」, 「堅」等。軟堅散結常用的中藥有鰲甲,夏枯草,昆布,海藻,牡蠣等 等。Search this siteProblems with website? Latin Name - 拉丁名: Illicium verum Hook. f.
Cantonese - 粵語發音: baat3 gok3 wui4 hoeng1 (八角茴香); baat3 gok3 (八角)
Other Name - 別名: da hui xiang 大茴香，da liao 大料，wu xiang ba jiao 五香八角，po shang hui xiang 舶上茴香、po hui xiang 舶茴香、hui xiang ba jiao zhu 茴香八角珠、ba jiao xiang 八角香、ba jiao da hui 八角大茴、ba jiao 八角、yuan you hui 原油茴。
Common Name - 英文名: Fructus Anisi stellati, star anise, star aniseed, Chinese star anise.
Distribution - 分佈: in Guangdong, Yunnan, Guizhou, Hunan, Taiwan provinces of China, also in southeast Asia and India etc.廣西、雲南、貴州 、廣東，湖南，台灣與東南亞，印度等地。
Meridians Entered - 歸經: liver, kidney, spleen, stomach.肝，腎，脾，胃。
Actions & Indications - 主治: being used in cold type of hernia, chronic lower back pain with shenxu (kidney deficient), vomiting due to coldness in stomach, pain and coldness in stomach.溫陽散寒，理氣止痛。用於寒疝腹痛， 腎虛腰痛，胃寒嘔吐，脘腹冷痛。
Chemical Ingredients - 化學成份: The seed containsevaporating oil about 4 to 9%. In general it contains about 5% and more of it in the skin of the seeds. The main evaporating oil is anethole (about 80 to 90%). Usually it separates itself when it is cold. The remainder are d-pinene, I--phellandrene, α-terpineol and small amount of safrole*, methyl chavicol.fat about 22% (mainly in seed)protein, resin, rubber etc.leaves contain: evaporating oil which consists of anethole, anisaldehyde etc.*In one study, it mentioned the safrole was not found in Illicium verum but found in all toxic Illicium species, but not in Illicium verum.[2]果實含揮發油4～9％，一般約為5％(果皮中較多)，脂肪油約22％(主存於種子中)及蛋白質，樹膠，樹脂等。揮發油中主要成份為茴香醚(anethole) 約80～90％，冷時常自油中析出，其餘為d-蒎烯 (d-pinene)，l- 水芹烯 (I--phellandrene) ，α-萜品醇 (α-terpineol)及 少量黃樟醚 (safrole)** ，甲基胡椒酚(methyl chavicol)。葉含揮發油，油中含茴香醚 (anethole)，茴香醛 (anisaldehyde)等**有研究报告說本品(Illicium verum)不含黃樟醚 (safrole)，但其他有毒的品種則含黃樟醚 [2]。
Samples of Formulae - 處方舉例: 1. Hernia: ba jiao hui xiang, xiao hui xiang 9 g each, ru xiang small amount. Boil with water. Use as tea. Cover the body to induce sweating. 2. li zhi san (source: Zheng Zhi Zhun Sheng):Application: For hernia, swelling of testes, pain cannot be tolerated.Composition: li zhi he (fresh, bake till dark) 14 pieces, star anise (stir fry), chen xiang. mu xiang, qing yan (coarse lake salt), table salt 3 g each, chuan lian zi fruit, xiao hui xiang 6 each.Take 9 g each time. Mix with warm rice wine and take with empty stomach 1. 疝氣：八角茴香，小 茴香， 各9克，, 乳香 些少。水煎服。蓋被取汗。 2, 荔枝散 (證治准繩)： 主治: 疝氣﹐睾 丸腫 大，痛不可忍組成：荔 枝核（用新鮮者，燒炭存性）14 枚，八 角茴香（炒）、沉 香、木 香 、青鹽、食 鹽 各3g，川 楝子肉、小茴香各6g。上為細末。 用法：每服9g，空腹時熱酒調下。
Contraindications / Toxicity - 毒素與禁忌: Use with care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat. Sometimes the Chinese star anise (Illicium verum) is adulterated with Japanese star anise (Illicium anisatum L) which can be toxic and may have side effects for infants. The side effects can include: signs of acute-onset irritability, jitteriness, clonus or myoclonus, increased deep tendon reflexes, nystagmus, vomiting, and seizures.[2] It is not advisable to use star anise on infants.陰虛火 旺者慎服。有時八角茴香 (Illicium verum)之商品可能混有日本産的八角茴香而對婴兒可能産生急 性發作之煩躁不安，顫抖，抽筋或肌陣攣，增加深部肌腱反射，眼 球震顫，嘔吐和癲癇。不應用之於婴兒。
Name: ba jiao hui xiang 八角茴香
Body: ba jiao hui xiang, star anise, Complementary and Alternative Healing UniversitySee moremenuat the bottom of pageba jiao hui xiang  八角茴香(in Engish and Chinese 中英對照)Editedby: Joe Hing kwok ChuSource: partially obtained from "Whole National Herb Edition (in Chinese)【摘錄】《全國中草藥匯編》The following formulae will be translated on demand:【附方】①治小腸氣墜：八角茴香，小茴香各三錢，乳 香少許。水(煎)服取汗。(《仁齋直指方》)②治疝氣偏墜：八角茴香末一兩，小茴香末一兩。用豬尿胞一個，連尿入二末於內，系定罐內，以酒煮爛，連胞搗丸如梧子大。每服五十丸，白湯下。(《衛生雜興》 )③治腰重刺脹：八角茴香，炒，為末，食前酒服二錢。(《仁齋直指方》)④治腰痛如刺：八角茴香(炒研)每服二錢，食前鹽湯下。外以糯米一，二升，炒熱，袋盛，拴於痛處。(《簡便單方》)⑤治大小便皆秘，腹脹如鼓，氣促：大 麻子(炒，去殼)半兩，八角茴香七個。上作末，生蔥白三七個，同研煎湯，調五 苓散服。(《永類鈐方》)⑥治風毒濕氣，攻疰成瘡，皮肉紫破膿壞，行步無力，皮肉焮熱：八角茴香(炒)，地 龍(去土，炒)，川 烏(炮，去皮尖)，烏 藥(銼)，牽牛子(炒)各一兩。 研杵勻細，酒煮糊為丸，如梧桐子大(如胡椒粒大小)。每服空心鹽湯下十五丸，日二。(《腳氣治法總要》茴香丸 )註：疰 zhù: 有灌注和久住之意,多指具有傳染性和病程長的慢性病,主 要指勞瘵。如:疰忤(中醫病名 。猶中惡);疰夏(中醫學名詞。通常指夏季身倦、體熱、食少等症狀)[1] http://tw.18dao.net/%E9%A6%96%E9%A0%81[2] http://jama.ama-assn.org/cgi/content/full/291/5/562Search this siteProblems with website?
